1 /**
  2  * @file timeline.js
  3  *
  4  * @brief
  5  * The Timeline is an interactive visualization chart to visualize events in
  6  * time, having a start and end date.
  7  * You can freely move and zoom in the timeline by dragging
  8  * and scrolling in the Timeline. Items are optionally dragable. The time
  9  * scale on the axis is adjusted automatically, and supports scales ranging
 10  * from milliseconds to years.
 11  *
 12  * Timeline is part of the CHAP Links library.
 13  *
 14  * Timeline is tested on Firefox 3.6, Safari 5.0, Chrome 6.0, Opera 10.6, and
 15  * Internet Explorer 6+.
 16  *
 17  * @license
 18  * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not
 19  * use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy
 20  * of the License at
 21  *

 23  *
 24  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
 25  * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT
 26  * WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the
 27  * License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under
 28  * the License.
 29  *
 30  * Copyright (c) 2011-2013 Almende B.V.

 57 /**
 58  * Declare a unique namespace for CHAP's Common Hybrid Visualisation Library,
 59  * "links"
 60  */
 61 if (typeof links === 'undefined') {
 62     links = {};
 63     // important: do not use var, as "var links = {};" will overwrite 
 64     //            the existing links variable value with undefined in IE8, IE7.  
 65 }
 66 
 67 
 68 /**
 69  * Ensure the variable google exists
 70  */
 71 if (typeof google === 'undefined') {
 72     google = undefined;
 73     // important: do not use var, as "var google = undefined;" will overwrite 
 74     //            the existing google variable value with undefined in IE8, IE7.
 75 }

 79 // Internet Explorer 8 and older does not support Array.indexOf,
 80 // so we define it here in that case
 81 // http://soledadpenades.com/2007/05/17/arrayindexof-in-internet-explorer/
 82 if(!Array.prototype.indexOf) {
 83     Array.prototype.indexOf = function(obj){
 84         for(var i = 0; i < this.length; i++){
 85             if(this[i] == obj){
 86                 return i;
 87             }
 88         }
 89         return -1;
 90     }
 91 }
 92 
 93 // Internet Explorer 8 and older does not support Array.forEach,
 94 // so we define it here in that case
 95 // https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/forEach
 96 if (!Array.prototype.forEach) {
 97     Array.prototype.forEach = function(fn, scope) {
 98         for(var i = 0, len = this.length; i < len; ++i) {
 99             fn.call(scope || this, this[i], i, this);
100         }
101     }
102 }

105 /**
106  * @constructor links.Timeline
107  * The timeline is a visualization chart to visualize events in time.
108  *
109  * The timeline is developed in javascript as a Google Visualization Chart.
110  *
111  * @param {Element} container   The DOM element in which the Timeline will
112  *                                  be created. Normally a div element.
113  */
114 links.Timeline = function(container) {
115     if (!container) {
116         // this call was probably only for inheritance, no constructor-code is required
117         return;
118     }
119 
120     // create variables and set default values
121     this.dom = {};
122     this.conversion = {};
123     this.eventParams = {}; // stores parameters for mouse events
124     this.groups = [];
125     this.groupIndexes = {};
126     this.items = [];
127     this.renderQueue = {
128         show: [],   // Items made visible but not yet added to DOM
129         hide: [],   // Items currently visible but not yet removed from DOM
130         update: []  // Items with changed data but not yet adjusted DOM
131     };
132     this.renderedItems = [];  // Items currently rendered in the DOM
133     this.clusterGenerator = new links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator(this);
134     this.currentClusters = [];
135     this.selection = undefined; // stores index and item which is currently selected
136 
137     this.listeners = {}; // event listener callbacks
138 
139     // Initialize sizes. 
140     // Needed for IE (which gives an error when you try to set an undefined
141     // value in a style)
142     this.size = {
143         'actualHeight': 0,
144         'axis': {
145             'characterMajorHeight': 0,
146             'characterMajorWidth': 0,
147             'characterMinorHeight': 0,
148             'characterMinorWidth': 0,
149             'height': 0,
150             'labelMajorTop': 0,
151             'labelMinorTop': 0,
152             'line': 0,
153             'lineMajorWidth': 0,
154             'lineMinorHeight': 0,
155             'lineMinorTop': 0,
156             'lineMinorWidth': 0,
157             'top': 0
158         },
159         'contentHeight': 0,
160         'contentLeft': 0,
161         'contentWidth': 0,
162         'frameHeight': 0,
163         'frameWidth': 0,
164         'groupsLeft': 0,
165         'groupsWidth': 0,
166         'items': {
167             'top': 0
168         }
169     };
170 
171     this.dom.container = container;
172 
173     this.options = {
174         'width': "100%",
175         'height': "auto",
176         'minHeight': 0,        // minimal height in pixels
177         'autoHeight': true,
178 
179         'eventMargin': 10,     // minimal margin between events
180         'eventMarginAxis': 20, // minimal margin between events and the axis
181         'dragAreaWidth': 10,   // pixels
182 
183         'min': undefined,
184         'max': undefined,
185         'zoomMin': 10,     // milliseconds
186         'zoomMax': 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365 * 10000, // milliseconds
187 
188         'moveable': true,
189         'zoomable': true,
190         'selectable': true,
191         'editable': false,
192         'snapEvents': true,
193         'groupChangeable': true,
194 
195         'showCurrentTime': true, // show a red bar displaying the current time
196         'showCustomTime': false, // show a blue, draggable bar displaying a custom time    
197         'showMajorLabels': true,
198         'showMinorLabels': true,
199         'showNavigation': false,
200         'showButtonNew': false,
201         'groupsOnRight': false,
202         'axisOnTop': false,
203         'stackEvents': true,
204         'animate': true,
205         'animateZoom': true,
206         'cluster': false,
207         'style': 'box',
208         'customStackOrder': false, //a function(a,b) for determining stackorder amongst a group of items. Essentially a comparator, -ve value for "a before b" and vice versa
209         
210         // i18n: Timeline only has built-in English text per default. Include timeline-locales.js to support more localized text.
211         'locale': 'en',
212         'MONTHS': new Array("January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"),
213         'MONTHS_SHORT': new Array("Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"),
214         'DAYS': new Array("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday"),
215         'DAYS_SHORT': new Array("Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"),
216         'ZOOM_IN': "Zoom in",
217         'ZOOM_OUT': "Zoom out",
218         'MOVE_LEFT': "Move left",
219         'MOVE_RIGHT': "Move right",
220         'NEW': "New",
221         'CREATE_NEW_EVENT': "Create new event"
222     };
223 
224     this.clientTimeOffset = 0;    // difference between client time and the time
225     // set via Timeline.setCurrentTime()
226     var dom = this.dom;
227 
228     // remove all elements from the container element.
229     while (dom.container.hasChildNodes()) {
230         dom.container.removeChild(dom.container.firstChild);
231     }
232 
233     // create a step for drawing the axis
234     this.step = new links.Timeline.StepDate();
235 
236     // add standard item types
237     this.itemTypes = {
238         box:   links.Timeline.ItemBox,
239         range: links.Timeline.ItemRange,
240         dot:   links.Timeline.ItemDot
241     };
242 
243     // initialize data
244     this.data = [];
245     this.firstDraw = true;
246 
247     // date interval must be initialized 
248     this.setVisibleChartRange(undefined, undefined, false);
249 
250     // render for the first time
251     this.render();
252 
253     // fire the ready event
254     var me = this;
255     setTimeout(function () {
256         me.trigger('ready');
257     }, 0);
258 };
259 
260 
261 /**
262  * Main drawing logic. This is the function that needs to be called
263  * in the html page, to draw the timeline.
264  *
265  * A data table with the events must be provided, and an options table.
266  *
267  * @param {google.visualization.DataTable}      data
268  *                                 The data containing the events for the timeline.
269  *                                 Object DataTable is defined in
270  *                                 google.visualization.DataTable
271  * @param {Object} options         A name/value map containing settings for the
272  *                                 timeline. Optional.
273  */
274 links.Timeline.prototype.draw = function(data, options) {
275     this.setOptions(options);
276 
277     // read the data
278     this.setData(data);
279 
280     // set timer range. this will also redraw the timeline
281     if (options && (options.start || options.end)) {
282         this.setVisibleChartRange(options.start, options.end);
283     }
284     else if (this.firstDraw) {
285         this.setVisibleChartRangeAuto();
286     }
287 
288     this.firstDraw = false;
289 };
290 
291 
292 /**
293  * Set options for the timeline.
294  * Timeline must be redrawn afterwards
295  * @param {Object} options A name/value map containing settings for the
296  *                                 timeline. Optional.
297  */
298 links.Timeline.prototype.setOptions = function(options) {
299     if (options) {
300         // retrieve parameter values
301         for (var i in options) {
302             if (options.hasOwnProperty(i)) {
303                 this.options[i] = options[i];
304             }
305         }
306         
307         // prepare i18n dependent on set locale
308         if (typeof links.locales !== 'undefined' && this.options.locale !== 'en') {
309             var localeOpts = links.locales[this.options.locale];
310             if(localeOpts) {
311                 for (var l in localeOpts) {
312                     if (localeOpts.hasOwnProperty(l)) {
313                         this.options[l] = localeOpts[l];
314                     }
315                 }
316             }
317         }
318 
319         // check for deprecated options
320         if (options.showButtonAdd != undefined) {
321             this.options.showButtonNew = options.showButtonAdd;
322             console.log('WARNING: Option showButtonAdd is deprecated. Use showButtonNew instead');
323         }
324         if (options.intervalMin != undefined) {
325             this.options.zoomMin = options.intervalMin;
326             console.log('WARNING: Option intervalMin is deprecated. Use zoomMin instead');
327         }
328         if (options.intervalMax != undefined) {
329             this.options.zoomMax = options.intervalMax;
330             console.log('WARNING: Option intervalMax is deprecated. Use zoomMax instead');
331         }
332 
333         if (options.scale && options.step) {
334             this.step.setScale(options.scale, options.step);
335         }
336     }
337 
338     // validate options
339     this.options.autoHeight = (this.options.height === "auto");
340 };
341 
342 /**
343  * Add new type of items
344  * @param {String} typeName  Name of new type
345  * @param {links.Timeline.Item} typeFactory Constructor of items
346  */
347 links.Timeline.prototype.addItemType = function (typeName, typeFactory) {
348     this.itemTypes[typeName] = typeFactory;
349 };
350 
351 /**
352  * Retrieve a map with the column indexes of the columns by column name.
353  * For example, the method returns the map
354  *     {
355  *         start: 0,
356  *         end: 1,
357  *         content: 2,
358  *         group: undefined,
359  *         className: undefined
360  *         editable: undefined
361  *     }
362  * @param {google.visualization.DataTable} dataTable
363  * @type {Object} map
364  */
365 links.Timeline.mapColumnIds = function (dataTable) {
366     var cols = {},
367         colMax = dataTable.getNumberOfColumns(),
368         allUndefined = true;
369 
370     // loop over the columns, and map the column id's to the column indexes
371     for (var col = 0; col < colMax; col++) {
372         var id = dataTable.getColumnId(col) || dataTable.getColumnLabel(col);
373         cols[id] = col;
374         if (id == 'start' || id == 'end' || id == 'content' ||
375             id == 'group' || id == 'className' || id == 'editable') {
376             allUndefined = false;
377         }
378     }
379 
380     // if no labels or ids are defined,
381     // use the default mapping for start, end, content
382     if (allUndefined) {
383         cols.start = 0;
384         cols.end = 1;
385         cols.content = 2;
386     }
387 
388     return cols;
389 };
390 
391 /**
392  * Set data for the timeline
393  * @param {google.visualization.DataTable | Array} data
394  */
395 links.Timeline.prototype.setData = function(data) {
396     // unselect any previously selected item
397     this.unselectItem();
398 
399     if (!data) {
400         data = [];
401     }
402 
403     // clear all data
404     this.stackCancelAnimation();
405     this.clearItems();
406     this.data = data;
407     var items = this.items;
408     this.deleteGroups();
409 
410     if (google && google.visualization &&
411         data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
412         // map the datatable columns
413         var cols = links.Timeline.mapColumnIds(data);
414 
415         // read DataTable
416         for (var row = 0, rows = data.getNumberOfRows(); row < rows; row++) {
417             items.push(this.createItem({
418                 'start':     ((cols.start != undefined)     ? data.getValue(row, cols.start)     : undefined),
419                 'end':       ((cols.end != undefined)       ? data.getValue(row, cols.end)       : undefined),
420                 'content':   ((cols.content != undefined)   ? data.getValue(row, cols.content)   : undefined),
421                 'group':     ((cols.group != undefined)     ? data.getValue(row, cols.group)     : undefined),
422                 'className': ((cols.className != undefined) ? data.getValue(row, cols.className) : undefined),
423                 'editable':  ((cols.editable != undefined)  ? data.getValue(row, cols.editable)  : undefined)
424             }));
425         }
426     }
427     else if (links.Timeline.isArray(data)) {
428         // read JSON array
429         for (var row = 0, rows = data.length; row < rows; row++) {
430             var itemData = data[row];
431             var item = this.createItem(itemData);
432             items.push(item);
433         }
434     }
435     else {
436         throw "Unknown data type. DataTable or Array expected.";
437     }
438 
439     // prepare data for clustering, by filtering and sorting by type
440     if (this.options.cluster) {
441         this.clusterGenerator.setData(this.items);
442     }
443 
444     this.render({
445         animate: false
446     });
447 };
448 
449 /**
450  * Return the original data table.
451  * @return {google.visualization.DataTable | Array} data
452  */
453 links.Timeline.prototype.getData = function  () {
454     return this.data;
455 };

458 /**
459  * Update the original data with changed start, end or group.
460  *
461  * @param {Number} index
462  * @param {Object} values   An object containing some of the following parameters:
463  *                          {Date} start,
464  *                          {Date} end,
465  *                          {String} content,
466  *                          {String} group
467  */
468 links.Timeline.prototype.updateData = function  (index, values) {
469     var data = this.data,
470         prop;
471 
472     if (google && google.visualization &&
473         data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
474         // update the original google DataTable
475         var missingRows = (index + 1) - data.getNumberOfRows();
476         if (missingRows > 0) {
477             data.addRows(missingRows);
478         }
479 
480         // map the column id's by name
481         var cols = links.Timeline.mapColumnIds(data);
482 
483         // merge all fields from the provided data into the current data
484         for (prop in values) {
485             if (values.hasOwnProperty(prop)) {
486                 var col = cols[prop];
487                 if (col == undefined) {
488                     // create new column
489                     var value = values[prop];
490                     var valueType = 'string';
491                     if (typeof(value) == 'number')       {valueType = 'number';}
492                     else if (typeof(value) == 'boolean') {valueType = 'boolean';}
493                     else if (value instanceof Date)      {valueType = 'datetime';}
494                     col = data.addColumn(valueType, prop);
495                 }
496                 data.setValue(index, col, values[prop]);
497 
498                 // TODO: correctly serialize the start and end Date to the desired type (Date, String, or Number)
499             }
500         }
501     }
502     else if (links.Timeline.isArray(data)) {
503         // update the original JSON table
504         var row = data[index];
505         if (row == undefined) {
506             row = {};
507             data[index] = row;
508         }
509 
510         // merge all fields from the provided data into the current data
511         for (prop in values) {
512             if (values.hasOwnProperty(prop)) {
513                 row[prop] = values[prop];
514 
515                 // TODO: correctly serialize the start and end Date to the desired type (Date, String, or Number)
516             }
517         }
518     }
519     else {
520         throw "Cannot update data, unknown type of data";
521     }
522 };
523 
524 /**
525  * Find the item index from a given HTML element
526  * If no item index is found, undefined is returned
527  * @param {Element} element
528  * @return {Number | undefined} index
529  */
530 links.Timeline.prototype.getItemIndex = function(element) {
531     var e = element,
532         dom = this.dom,
533         frame = dom.items.frame,
534         items = this.items,
535         index = undefined;
536 
537     // try to find the frame where the items are located in
538     while (e.parentNode && e.parentNode !== frame) {
539         e = e.parentNode;
540     }
541 
542     if (e.parentNode === frame) {
543         // yes! we have found the parent element of all items
544         // retrieve its id from the array with items
545         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
546             if (items[i].dom === e) {
547                 index = i;
548                 break;
549             }
550         }
551     }
552 
553     return index;
554 };

556 /**
557  * Set a new size for the timeline
558  * @param {string} width   Width in pixels or percentage (for example "800px"
559  *                         or "50%")
560  * @param {string} height  Height in pixels or percentage  (for example "400px"
561  *                         or "30%")
562  */
563 links.Timeline.prototype.setSize = function(width, height) {
564     if (width) {
565         this.options.width = width;
566         this.dom.frame.style.width = width;
567     }
568     if (height) {
569         this.options.height = height;
570         this.options.autoHeight = (this.options.height === "auto");
571         if (height !==  "auto" ) {
572             this.dom.frame.style.height = height;
573         }
574     }
575 
576     this.render({
577         animate: false
578     });
579 };

582 /**
583  * Set a new value for the visible range int the timeline.
584  * Set start undefined to include everything from the earliest date to end.
585  * Set end undefined to include everything from start to the last date.
586  * Example usage:
587  *    myTimeline.setVisibleChartRange(new Date("2010-08-22"),
588  *                                    new Date("2010-09-13"));
589  * @param {Date}   start     The start date for the timeline. optional
590  * @param {Date}   end       The end date for the timeline. optional
591  * @param {boolean} redraw   Optional. If true (default) the Timeline is
592  *                           directly redrawn
593  */
594 links.Timeline.prototype.setVisibleChartRange = function(start, end, redraw) {
595     var range = {};
596     if (!start || !end) {
597         // retrieve the date range of the items
598         range = this.getDataRange(true);
599     }
600 
601     if (!start) {
602         if (end) {
603             if (range.min && range.min.valueOf() < end.valueOf()) {
604                 // start of the data
605                 start = range.min;
606             }
607             else {
608                 // 7 days before the end
609                 start = new Date(end.valueOf());
610                 start.setDate(start.getDate() - 7);
611             }
612         }
613         else {
614             // default of 3 days ago
615             start = new Date();
616             start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
617         }
618     }
619 
620     if (!end) {
621         if (range.max) {
622             // end of the data
623             end = range.max;
624         }
625         else {
626             // 7 days after start
627             end = new Date(start.valueOf());
628             end.setDate(end.getDate() + 7);
629         }
630     }
631 
632     // prevent start Date <= end Date
633     if (end <= start) {
634         end = new Date(start.valueOf());
635         end.setDate(end.getDate() + 7);
636     }
637 
638     // limit to the allowed range (don't let this do by applyRange,
639     // because that method will try to maintain the interval (end-start)
640     var min = this.options.min ? this.options.min : undefined; // date
641     if (min != undefined && start.valueOf() < min.valueOf()) {
642         start = new Date(min.valueOf()); // date
643     }
644     var max = this.options.max ? this.options.max : undefined; // date
645     if (max != undefined && end.valueOf() > max.valueOf()) {
646         end = new Date(max.valueOf()); // date
647     }
648 
649     this.applyRange(start, end);
650 
651     if (redraw == undefined || redraw == true) {
652         this.render({
653             animate: false
654         });  // TODO: optimize, no reflow needed
655     }
656     else {
657         this.recalcConversion();
658     }
659 };
660 
661 
662 /**
663  * Change the visible chart range such that all items become visible
664  */
665 links.Timeline.prototype.setVisibleChartRangeAuto = function() {
666     var range = this.getDataRange(true);
667     this.setVisibleChartRange(range.min, range.max);
668 };
669 
670 /**
671  * Adjust the visible range such that the current time is located in the center
672  * of the timeline
673  */
674 links.Timeline.prototype.setVisibleChartRangeNow = function() {
675     var now = new Date();
676 
677     var diff = (this.end.valueOf() - this.start.valueOf());
678 
679     var startNew = new Date(now.valueOf() - diff/2);
680     var endNew = new Date(startNew.valueOf() + diff);
681     this.setVisibleChartRange(startNew, endNew);
682 };
683 
684 
685 /**
686  * Retrieve the current visible range in the timeline.
687  * @return {Object} An object with start and end properties
688  */
689 links.Timeline.prototype.getVisibleChartRange = function() {
690     return {
691         'start': new Date(this.start.valueOf()),
692         'end': new Date(this.end.valueOf())
693     };
694 };
695 
696 /**
697  * Get the date range of the items.
698  * @param {boolean} [withMargin]  If true, 5% of whitespace is added to the
699  *                                left and right of the range. Default is false.
700  * @return {Object} range    An object with parameters min and max.
701  *                           - {Date} min is the lowest start date of the items
702  *                           - {Date} max is the highest start or end date of the items
703  *                           If no data is available, the values of min and max
704  *                           will be undefined
705  */
706 links.Timeline.prototype.getDataRange = function (withMargin) {
707     var items = this.items,
708         min = undefined, // number
709         max = undefined; // number
710 
711     if (items) {
712         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
713             var item = items[i],
714                 start = item.start != undefined ? item.start.valueOf() : undefined,
715                 end   = item.end != undefined   ? item.end.valueOf() : start;
716 
717             if (min != undefined && start != undefined) {
718                 min = Math.min(min.valueOf(), start.valueOf());
719             }
720             else {
721                 min = start;
722             }
723 
724             if (max != undefined && end != undefined) {
725                 max = Math.max(max, end);
726             }
727             else {
728                 max = end;
729             }
730         }
731     }
732 
733     if (min && max && withMargin) {
734         // zoom out 5% such that you have a little white space on the left and right
735         var diff = (max - min);
736         min = min - diff * 0.05;
737         max = max + diff * 0.05;
738     }
739 
740     return {
741         'min': min != undefined ? new Date(min) : undefined,
742         'max': max != undefined ? new Date(max) : undefined
743     };
744 };
745 
746 /**
747  * Re-render (reflow and repaint) all components of the Timeline: frame, axis,
748  * items, ...
749  * @param {Object} [options]  Available options:
750  *                            {boolean} renderTimesLeft   Number of times the
751  *                                                        render may be repeated
752  *                                                        5 times by default.
753  *                            {boolean} animate           takes options.animate
754  *                                                        as default value
755  */
756 links.Timeline.prototype.render = function(options) {
757     var frameResized = this.reflowFrame();
758     var axisResized = this.reflowAxis();
759     var groupsResized = this.reflowGroups();
760     var itemsResized = this.reflowItems();
761     var resized = (frameResized || axisResized || groupsResized || itemsResized);
762 
763     // TODO: only stackEvents/filterItems when resized or changed. (gives a bootstrap issue).
764     // if (resized) {
765     var animate = this.options.animate;
766     if (options && options.animate != undefined) {
767         animate = options.animate;
768     }
769 
770     this.recalcConversion();
771     this.clusterItems();
772     this.filterItems();
773     this.stackItems(animate);
774 
775     this.recalcItems();
776 
777     // TODO: only repaint when resized or when filterItems or stackItems gave a change?
778     var needsReflow = this.repaint();
779 
780     // re-render once when needed (prevent endless re-render loop)
781     if (needsReflow) {
782         var renderTimesLeft = options ? options.renderTimesLeft : undefined;
783         if (renderTimesLeft == undefined) {
784             renderTimesLeft = 5;
785         }
786         if (renderTimesLeft > 0) {
787             this.render({
788                 'animate': options ? options.animate: undefined,
789                 'renderTimesLeft': (renderTimesLeft - 1)
790             });
791         }
792     }
793 };
794 
795 /**
796  * Repaint all components of the Timeline
797  * @return {boolean} needsReflow   Returns true if the DOM is changed such that
798  *                                 a reflow is needed.
799  */
800 links.Timeline.prototype.repaint = function() {
801     var frameNeedsReflow = this.repaintFrame();
802     var axisNeedsReflow  = this.repaintAxis();
803     var groupsNeedsReflow  = this.repaintGroups();
804     var itemsNeedsReflow = this.repaintItems();
805     this.repaintCurrentTime();
806     this.repaintCustomTime();
807 
808     return (frameNeedsReflow || axisNeedsReflow || groupsNeedsReflow || itemsNeedsReflow);
809 };
810 
811 /**
812  * Reflow the timeline frame
813  * @return {boolean} resized    Returns true if any of the frame elements
814  *                              have been resized.
815  */
816 links.Timeline.prototype.reflowFrame = function() {
817     var dom = this.dom,
818         options = this.options,
819         size = this.size,
820         resized = false;
821 
822     // Note: IE7 has issues with giving frame.clientWidth, therefore I use offsetWidth instead
823     var frameWidth  = dom.frame ? dom.frame.offsetWidth : 0,
824         frameHeight = dom.frame ? dom.frame.clientHeight : 0;
825 
826     resized = resized || (size.frameWidth !== frameWidth);
827     resized = resized || (size.frameHeight !== frameHeight);
828     size.frameWidth = frameWidth;
829     size.frameHeight = frameHeight;
830 
831     return resized;
832 };
833 
834 /**
835  * repaint the Timeline frame
836  * @return {boolean} needsReflow   Returns true if the DOM is changed such that
837  *                                 a reflow is needed.
838  */
839 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintFrame = function() {
840     var needsReflow = false,
841         dom = this.dom,
842         options = this.options,
843         size = this.size;
844 
845     // main frame
846     if (!dom.frame) {
847         dom.frame = document.createElement("DIV");
848         dom.frame.className = "timeline-frame";
849         dom.frame.style.position = "relative";
850         dom.frame.style.overflow = "hidden";
851         dom.container.appendChild(dom.frame);
852         needsReflow = true;
853     }
854 
855     var height = options.autoHeight ?
856         (size.actualHeight + "px") :
857         (options.height || "100%");
858     var width  = options.width || "100%";
859     needsReflow = needsReflow || (dom.frame.style.height != height);
860     needsReflow = needsReflow || (dom.frame.style.width != width);
861     dom.frame.style.height = height;
862     dom.frame.style.width = width;
863 
864     // contents
865     if (!dom.content) {
866         // create content box where the axis and items will be created
867         dom.content = document.createElement("DIV");
868         dom.content.style.position = "relative";
869         dom.content.style.overflow = "hidden";
870         dom.frame.appendChild(dom.content);
871 
872         var timelines = document.createElement("DIV");
873         timelines.style.position = "absolute";
874         timelines.style.left = "0px";
875         timelines.style.top = "0px";
876         timelines.style.height = "100%";
877         timelines.style.width = "0px";
878         dom.content.appendChild(timelines);
879         dom.contentTimelines = timelines;
880 
881         var params = this.eventParams,
882             me = this;
883         if (!params.onMouseDown) {
884             params.onMouseDown = function (event) {me.onMouseDown(event);};
885             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "mousedown", params.onMouseDown);
886         }
887         if (!params.onTouchStart) {
888             params.onTouchStart = function (event) {me.onTouchStart(event);};
889             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "touchstart", params.onTouchStart);
890         }
891         if (!params.onMouseWheel) {
892             params.onMouseWheel = function (event) {me.onMouseWheel(event);};
893             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "mousewheel", params.onMouseWheel);
894         }
895         if (!params.onDblClick) {
896             params.onDblClick = function (event) {me.onDblClick(event);};
897             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "dblclick", params.onDblClick);
898         }
899 
900         needsReflow = true;
901     }
902     dom.content.style.left = size.contentLeft + "px";
903     dom.content.style.top = "0px";
904     dom.content.style.width = size.contentWidth + "px";
905     dom.content.style.height = size.frameHeight + "px";
906 
907     this.repaintNavigation();
908 
909     return needsReflow;
910 };
911 
912 /**
913  * Reflow the timeline axis. Calculate its height, width, positioning, etc...
914  * @return {boolean} resized    returns true if the axis is resized
915  */
916 links.Timeline.prototype.reflowAxis = function() {
917     var resized = false,
918         dom = this.dom,
919         options = this.options,
920         size = this.size,
921         axisDom = dom.axis;
922 
923     var characterMinorWidth  = (axisDom && axisDom.characterMinor) ? axisDom.characterMinor.clientWidth : 0,
924         characterMinorHeight = (axisDom && axisDom.characterMinor) ? axisDom.characterMinor.clientHeight : 0,
925         characterMajorWidth  = (axisDom && axisDom.characterMajor) ? axisDom.characterMajor.clientWidth : 0,
926         characterMajorHeight = (axisDom && axisDom.characterMajor) ? axisDom.characterMajor.clientHeight : 0,
927         axisHeight = (options.showMinorLabels ? characterMinorHeight : 0) +
928             (options.showMajorLabels ? characterMajorHeight : 0);
929 
930     var axisTop  = options.axisOnTop ? 0 : size.frameHeight - axisHeight,
931         axisLine = options.axisOnTop ? axisHeight : axisTop;
932 
933     resized = resized || (size.axis.top !== axisTop);
934     resized = resized || (size.axis.line !== axisLine);
935     resized = resized || (size.axis.height !== axisHeight);
936     size.axis.top = axisTop;
937     size.axis.line = axisLine;
938     size.axis.height = axisHeight;
939     size.axis.labelMajorTop = options.axisOnTop ? 0 : axisLine +
940         (options.showMinorLabels ? characterMinorHeight : 0);
941     size.axis.labelMinorTop = options.axisOnTop ?
942         (options.showMajorLabels ? characterMajorHeight : 0) :
943         axisLine;
944     size.axis.lineMinorTop = options.axisOnTop ? size.axis.labelMinorTop : 0;
945     size.axis.lineMinorHeight = options.showMajorLabels ?
946         size.frameHeight - characterMajorHeight:
947         size.frameHeight;
948     if (axisDom && axisDom.minorLines && axisDom.minorLines.length) {
949         size.axis.lineMinorWidth = axisDom.minorLines[0].offsetWidth;
950     }
951     else {
952         size.axis.lineMinorWidth = 1;
953     }
954     if (axisDom && axisDom.majorLines && axisDom.majorLines.length) {
955         size.axis.lineMajorWidth = axisDom.majorLines[0].offsetWidth;
956     }
957     else {
958         size.axis.lineMajorWidth = 1;
959     }
960 
961     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMinorWidth  !== characterMinorWidth);
962     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMinorHeight !== characterMinorHeight);
963     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMajorWidth  !== characterMajorWidth);
964     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMajorHeight !== characterMajorHeight);
965     size.axis.characterMinorWidth  = characterMinorWidth;
966     size.axis.characterMinorHeight = characterMinorHeight;
967     size.axis.characterMajorWidth  = characterMajorWidth;
968     size.axis.characterMajorHeight = characterMajorHeight;
969 
970     var contentHeight = Math.max(size.frameHeight - axisHeight, 0);
971     size.contentLeft = options.groupsOnRight ? 0 : size.groupsWidth;
972     size.contentWidth = Math.max(size.frameWidth - size.groupsWidth, 0);
973     size.contentHeight = contentHeight;
974 
975     return resized;
976 };
977 
978 /**
979  * Redraw the timeline axis with minor and major labels
980  * @return {boolean} needsReflow     Returns true if the DOM is changed such
981  *                                   that a reflow is needed.
982  */
983 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxis = function() {
984     var needsReflow = false,
985         dom = this.dom,
986         options = this.options,
987         size = this.size,
988         step = this.step;
989 
990     var axis = dom.axis;
991     if (!axis) {
992         axis = {};
993         dom.axis = axis;
994     }
995     if (!size.axis.properties) {
996         size.axis.properties = {};
997     }
998     if (!axis.minorTexts) {
999         axis.minorTexts = [];
1000     }
1001     if (!axis.minorLines) {
1002         axis.minorLines = [];
1003     }
1004     if (!axis.majorTexts) {
1005         axis.majorTexts = [];
1006     }
1007     if (!axis.majorLines) {
1008         axis.majorLines = [];
1009     }
1010 
1011     if (!axis.frame) {
1012         axis.frame = document.createElement("DIV");
1013         axis.frame.style.position = "absolute";
1014         axis.frame.style.left = "0px";
1015         axis.frame.style.top = "0px";
1016         dom.content.appendChild(axis.frame);
1017     }
1018 
1019     // take axis offline
1020     dom.content.removeChild(axis.frame);
1021 
1022     axis.frame.style.width = (size.contentWidth) + "px";
1023     axis.frame.style.height = (size.axis.height) + "px";
1024 
1025     // the drawn axis is more wide than the actual visual part, such that
1026     // the axis can be dragged without having to redraw it each time again.
1027     var start = this.screenToTime(0);
1028     var end = this.screenToTime(size.contentWidth);
1029 
1030     // calculate minimum step (in milliseconds) based on character size
1031     if (size.axis.characterMinorWidth) {
1032         this.minimumStep = this.screenToTime(size.axis.characterMinorWidth * 6) -
1033             this.screenToTime(0);
1034 
1035         step.setRange(start, end, this.minimumStep);
1036     }
1037 
1038     var charsNeedsReflow = this.repaintAxisCharacters();
1039     needsReflow = needsReflow || charsNeedsReflow;
1040 
1041     // The current labels on the axis will be re-used (much better performance),
1042     // therefore, the repaintAxis method uses the mechanism with
1043     // repaintAxisStartOverwriting, repaintAxisEndOverwriting, and
1044     // this.size.axis.properties is used.
1045     this.repaintAxisStartOverwriting();
1046 
1047     step.start();
1048     var xFirstMajorLabel = undefined;
1049     var max = 0;
1050     while (!step.end() && max < 1000) {
1051         max++;
1052         var cur = step.getCurrent(),
1053             x = this.timeToScreen(cur),
1054             isMajor = step.isMajor();
1055 
1056         if (options.showMinorLabels) {
1057             this.repaintAxisMinorText(x, step.getLabelMinor(options));
1058         }
1059 
1060         if (isMajor && options.showMajorLabels) {
1061             if (x > 0) {
1062                 if (xFirstMajorLabel == undefined) {
1063                     xFirstMajorLabel = x;
1064                 }
1065                 this.repaintAxisMajorText(x, step.getLabelMajor(options));
1066             }
1067             this.repaintAxisMajorLine(x);
1068         }
1069         else {
1070             this.repaintAxisMinorLine(x);
1071         }
1072 
1073         step.next();
1074     }
1075 
1076     // create a major label on the left when needed
1077     if (options.showMajorLabels) {
1078         var leftTime = this.screenToTime(0),
1079             leftText = this.step.getLabelMajor(options, leftTime),
1080             width = leftText.length * size.axis.characterMajorWidth + 10; // upper bound estimation
1081 
1082         if (xFirstMajorLabel == undefined || width < xFirstMajorLabel) {
1083             this.repaintAxisMajorText(0, leftText, leftTime);
1084         }
1085     }
1086 
1087     // cleanup left over labels
1088     this.repaintAxisEndOverwriting();
1089 
1090     this.repaintAxisHorizontal();
1091 
1092     // put axis online
1093     dom.content.insertBefore(axis.frame, dom.content.firstChild);
1094 
1095     return needsReflow;
1096 };
1097 
1098 /**
1099  * Create characters used to determine the size of text on the axis
1100  * @return {boolean} needsReflow   Returns true if the DOM is changed such that
1101  *                                 a reflow is needed.
1102  */
1103 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisCharacters = function () {
1104     // calculate the width and height of a single character
1105     // this is used to calculate the step size, and also the positioning of the
1106     // axis
1107     var needsReflow = false,
1108         dom = this.dom,
1109         axis = dom.axis,
1110         text;
1111 
1112     if (!axis.characterMinor) {
1113         text = document.createTextNode("0");
1114         var characterMinor = document.createElement("DIV");
1115         characterMinor.className = "timeline-axis-text timeline-axis-text-minor";
1116         characterMinor.appendChild(text);
1117         characterMinor.style.position = "absolute";
1118         characterMinor.style.visibility = "hidden";
1119         characterMinor.style.paddingLeft = "0px";
1120         characterMinor.style.paddingRight = "0px";
1121         axis.frame.appendChild(characterMinor);
1122 
1123         axis.characterMinor = characterMinor;
1124         needsReflow = true;
1125     }
1126 
1127     if (!axis.characterMajor) {
1128         text = document.createTextNode("0");
1129         var characterMajor = document.createElement("DIV");
1130         characterMajor.className = "timeline-axis-text timeline-axis-text-major";
1131         characterMajor.appendChild(text);
1132         characterMajor.style.position = "absolute";
1133         characterMajor.style.visibility = "hidden";
1134         characterMajor.style.paddingLeft = "0px";
1135         characterMajor.style.paddingRight = "0px";
1136         axis.frame.appendChild(characterMajor);
1137 
1138         axis.characterMajor = characterMajor;
1139         needsReflow = true;
1140     }
1141 
1142     return needsReflow;
1143 };
1144 
1145 /**
1146  * Initialize redraw of the axis. All existing labels and lines will be
1147  * overwritten and reused.
1148  */
1149 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisStartOverwriting = function () {
1150     var properties = this.size.axis.properties;
1151 
1152     properties.minorTextNum = 0;
1153     properties.minorLineNum = 0;
1154     properties.majorTextNum = 0;
1155     properties.majorLineNum = 0;
1156 };
1157 
1158 /**
1159  * End of overwriting HTML DOM elements of the axis.
1160  * remaining elements will be removed
1161  */
1162 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisEndOverwriting = function () {
1163     var dom = this.dom,
1164         props = this.size.axis.properties,
1165         frame = this.dom.axis.frame,
1166         num;
1167 
1168     // remove leftovers
1169     var minorTexts = dom.axis.minorTexts;
1170     num = props.minorTextNum;
1171     while (minorTexts.length > num) {
1172         var minorText = minorTexts[num];
1173         frame.removeChild(minorText);
1174         minorTexts.splice(num, 1);
1175     }
1176 
1177     var minorLines = dom.axis.minorLines;
1178     num = props.minorLineNum;
1179     while (minorLines.length > num) {
1180         var minorLine = minorLines[num];
1181         frame.removeChild(minorLine);
1182         minorLines.splice(num, 1);
1183     }
1184 
1185     var majorTexts = dom.axis.majorTexts;
1186     num = props.majorTextNum;
1187     while (majorTexts.length > num) {
1188         var majorText = majorTexts[num];
1189         frame.removeChild(majorText);
1190         majorTexts.splice(num, 1);
1191     }
1192 
1193     var majorLines = dom.axis.majorLines;
1194     num = props.majorLineNum;
1195     while (majorLines.length > num) {
1196         var majorLine = majorLines[num];
1197         frame.removeChild(majorLine);
1198         majorLines.splice(num, 1);
1199     }
1200 };
1201 
1202 /**
1203  * Repaint the horizontal line and background of the axis
1204  */
1205 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisHorizontal = function() {
1206     var axis = this.dom.axis,
1207         size = this.size,
1208         options = this.options;
1209 
1210     // line behind all axis elements (possibly having a background color)
1211     var hasAxis = (options.showMinorLabels || options.showMajorLabels);
1212     if (hasAxis) {
1213         if (!axis.backgroundLine) {
1214             // create the axis line background (for a background color or so)
1215             var backgroundLine = document.createElement("DIV");
1216             backgroundLine.className = "timeline-axis";
1217             backgroundLine.style.position = "absolute";
1218             backgroundLine.style.left = "0px";
1219             backgroundLine.style.width = "100%";
1220             backgroundLine.style.border = "none";
1221             axis.frame.insertBefore(backgroundLine, axis.frame.firstChild);
1222 
1223             axis.backgroundLine = backgroundLine;
1224         }
1225 
1226         if (axis.backgroundLine) {
1227             axis.backgroundLine.style.top = size.axis.top + "px";
1228             axis.backgroundLine.style.height = size.axis.height + "px";
1229         }
1230     }
1231     else {
1232         if (axis.backgroundLine) {
1233             axis.frame.removeChild(axis.backgroundLine);
1234             delete axis.backgroundLine;
1235         }
1236     }
1237 
1238     // line before all axis elements
1239     if (hasAxis) {
1240         if (axis.line) {
1241             // put this line at the end of all childs
1242             var line = axis.frame.removeChild(axis.line);
1243             axis.frame.appendChild(line);
1244         }
1245         else {
1246             // make the axis line
1247             var line = document.createElement("DIV");
1248             line.className = "timeline-axis";
1249             line.style.position = "absolute";
1250             line.style.left = "0px";
1251             line.style.width = "100%";
1252             line.style.height = "0px";
1253             axis.frame.appendChild(line);
1254 
1255             axis.line = line;
1256         }
1257 
1258         axis.line.style.top = size.axis.line + "px";
1259     }
1260     else {
1261         if (axis.line && axis.line.parentElement) {
1262             axis.frame.removeChild(axis.line);
1263             delete axis.line;
1264         }
1265     }
1266 };

1268 /**
1269  * Create a minor label for the axis at position x
1270  * @param {Number} x
1271  * @param {String} text
1272  */
1273 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisMinorText = function (x, text) {
1274     var size = this.size,
1275         dom = this.dom,
1276         props = size.axis.properties,
1277         frame = dom.axis.frame,
1278         minorTexts = dom.axis.minorTexts,
1279         index = props.minorTextNum,
1280         label;
1281 
1282     if (index < minorTexts.length) {
1283         label = minorTexts[index]
1284     }
1285     else {
1286         // create new label
1287         var content = document.createTextNode("");
1288         label = document.createElement("DIV");
1289         label.appendChild(content);
1290         label.className = "timeline-axis-text timeline-axis-text-minor";
1291         label.style.position = "absolute";
1292 
1293         frame.appendChild(label);
1294 
1295         minorTexts.push(label);
1296     }
1297 
1298     label.childNodes[0].nodeValue = text;
1299     label.style.left = x + "px";
1300     label.style.top  = size.axis.labelMinorTop + "px";
1301     //label.title = title;  // TODO: this is a heavy operation
1302 
1303     props.minorTextNum++;
1304 };
1305 
1306 /**
1307  * Create a minor line for the axis at position x
1308  * @param {Number} x
1309  */
1310 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisMinorLine = function (x) {

1312         dom = this.dom,
1313         props = axis.properties,
1314         frame = dom.axis.frame,
1315         minorLines = dom.axis.minorLines,
1316         index = props.minorLineNum,
1317         line;
1318 
1319     if (index < minorLines.length) {
1320         line = minorLines[index];
1321     }
1322     else {
1323         // create vertical line
1324         line = document.createElement("DIV");
1325         line.className = "timeline-axis-grid timeline-axis-grid-minor";
1326         line.style.position = "absolute";
1327         line.style.width = "0px";
1328 
1329         frame.appendChild(line);
1330         minorLines.push(line);
1331     }
1332 
1333     line.style.top = axis.lineMinorTop + "px";
1334     line.style.height = axis.lineMinorHeight + "px";
1335     line.style.left = (x - axis.lineMinorWidth/2) + "px";
1336 
1337     props.minorLineNum++;
1338 };

1340 /**

1342  * @param {Number} x

1345 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisMajorText = function (x, text) {

1348         frame = this.dom.axis.frame,
1349         majorTexts = this.dom.axis.majorTexts,
1350         index = props.majorTextNum,
1351         label;
1352 
1353     if (index < majorTexts.length) {
1354         label = majorTexts[index];
1355     }
1356     else {
1357         // create label
1358         var content = document.createTextNode(text);

1360         label.className = "timeline-axis-text timeline-axis-text-major";
1361         label.appendChild(content);
1362         label.style.position = "absolute";
1363         label.style.top = "0px";
1364 
1365         frame.appendChild(label);
1366         majorTexts.push(label);
1367     }
1368 
1369     label.childNodes[0].nodeValue = text;
1370     label.style.top = size.axis.labelMajorTop + "px";
1371     label.style.left = x + "px";
1372     //label.title = title; // TODO: this is a heavy operation
1373 
1374     props.majorTextNum ++;
1375 };
1376 
1377 /**
1378  * Create a Major line for the axis at position x
1379  * @param {Number} x
1380  */
1381 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintAxisMajorLine = function (x) {
1382     var size = this.size,
1383         props = size.axis.properties,
1384         axis = this.size.axis,
1385         frame = this.dom.axis.frame,
1386         majorLines = this.dom.axis.majorLines,
1387         index = props.majorLineNum,
1388         line;
1389 
1390     if (index < majorLines.length) {
1391         line = majorLines[index];
1392     }
1393     else {
1394         // create vertical line
1395         line = document.createElement("DIV");
1396         line.className = "timeline-axis-grid timeline-axis-grid-major";
1397         line.style.position = "absolute";
1398         line.style.top = "0px";
1399         line.style.width = "0px";
1400 
1401         frame.appendChild(line);
1402         majorLines.push(line);
1403     }
1404 
1405     line.style.left = (x - axis.lineMajorWidth/2) + "px";
1406     line.style.height = size.frameHeight + "px";
1407 
1408     props.majorLineNum ++;
1409 };
1410 
1411 /**
1412  * Reflow all items, retrieve their actual size
1413  * @return {boolean} resized    returns true if any of the items is resized
1414  */
1415 links.Timeline.prototype.reflowItems = function() {
1416     var resized = false,
1417         i,
1418         iMax,
1419         group,
1420         groups = this.groups,
1421         renderedItems = this.renderedItems;
1422 
1423     if (groups) { // TODO: need to check if labels exists?
1424         // loop through all groups to reset the items height
1425         groups.forEach(function (group) {
1426             group.itemsHeight = 0;
1427         });
1428     }
1429 
1430     // loop through the width and height of all visible items
1431     for (i = 0, iMax = renderedItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1432         var item = renderedItems[i],
1433             domItem = item.dom;
1434         group = item.group;
1435 
1436         if (domItem) {
1437             // TODO: move updating width and height into item.reflow
1438             var width = domItem ? domItem.clientWidth : 0;
1439             var height = domItem ? domItem.clientHeight : 0;
1440             resized = resized || (item.width != width);
1441             resized = resized || (item.height != height);
1442             item.width = width;
1443             item.height = height;
1444             //item.borderWidth = (domItem.offsetWidth - domItem.clientWidth - 2) / 2; // TODO: borderWidth
1445             item.reflow();
1446         }
1447 
1448         if (group) {
1449             group.itemsHeight = group.itemsHeight ?
1450                 Math.max(group.itemsHeight, item.height) :
1451                 item.height;
1452         }
1453     }
1454 
1455     return resized;
1456 };
1457 
1458 /**
1459  * Recalculate item properties:
1460  * - the height of each group.
1461  * - the actualHeight, from the stacked items or the sum of the group heights
1462  * @return {boolean} resized    returns true if any of the items properties is
1463  *                              changed
1464  */
1465 links.Timeline.prototype.recalcItems = function () {
1466     var resized = false,
1467         i,
1468         iMax,
1469         item,
1470         finalItem,
1471         finalItems,
1472         group,
1473         groups = this.groups,
1474         size = this.size,
1475         options = this.options,
1476         renderedItems = this.renderedItems;
1477 
1478     var actualHeight = 0;
1479     if (groups.length == 0) {
1480         // calculate actual height of the timeline when there are no groups
1481         // but stacked items
1482         if (options.autoHeight || options.cluster) {
1483             var min = 0,
1484                 max = 0;
1485 
1486             if (this.stack && this.stack.finalItems) {
1487                 // adjust the offset of all finalItems when the actualHeight has been changed
1488                 finalItems = this.stack.finalItems;
1489                 finalItem = finalItems[0];
1490                 if (finalItem && finalItem.top) {
1491                     min = finalItem.top;
1492                     max = finalItem.top + finalItem.height;
1493                 }
1494                 for (i = 1, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1495                     finalItem = finalItems[i];
1496                     min = Math.min(min, finalItem.top);
1497                     max = Math.max(max, finalItem.top + finalItem.height);
1498                 }
1499             }
1500             else {
1501                 item = renderedItems[0];
1502                 if (item && item.top) {
1503                     min = item.top;
1504                     max = item.top + item.height;
1505                 }
1506                 for (i = 1, iMax = renderedItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1507                     item = renderedItems[i];
1508                     if (item.top) {
1509                         min = Math.min(min, item.top);
1510                         max = Math.max(max, (item.top + item.height));
1511                     }
1512                 }
1513             }
1514 
1515             actualHeight = (max - min) + 2 * options.eventMarginAxis + size.axis.height;
1516             if (actualHeight < options.minHeight) {
1517                 actualHeight = options.minHeight;
1518             }
1519 
1520             if (size.actualHeight != actualHeight && options.autoHeight && !options.axisOnTop) {
1521                 // adjust the offset of all items when the actualHeight has been changed
1522                 var diff = actualHeight - size.actualHeight;
1523                 if (this.stack && this.stack.finalItems) {
1524                     finalItems = this.stack.finalItems;
1525                     for (i = 0, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1526                         finalItems[i].top += diff;
1527                         finalItems[i].item.top += diff;
1528                     }
1529                 }
1530                 else {
1531                     for (i = 0, iMax = renderedItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1532                         renderedItems[i].top += diff;
1533                     }
1534                 }
1535             }
1536         }
1537     }
1538     else {
1539         // loop through all groups to get the height of each group, and the
1540         // total height
1541         actualHeight = size.axis.height + 2 * options.eventMarginAxis;
1542         for (i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1543             group = groups[i];
1544 
1545             var groupHeight = Math.max(group.labelHeight || 0, group.itemsHeight || 0);
1546             resized = resized || (groupHeight != group.height);
1547             group.height = groupHeight;
1548 
1549             actualHeight += groups[i].height + options.eventMargin;
1550         }
1551 
1552         // calculate top positions of the group labels and lines
1553         var eventMargin = options.eventMargin,
1554             top = options.axisOnTop ?
1555                 options.eventMarginAxis + eventMargin/2 :
1556                 size.contentHeight - options.eventMarginAxis + eventMargin/ 2,
1557             axisHeight = size.axis.height;
1558 
1559         for (i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1560             group = groups[i];
1561             if (options.axisOnTop) {
1562                 group.top = top + axisHeight;
1563                 group.labelTop = top + axisHeight + (group.height - group.labelHeight) / 2;
1564                 group.lineTop = top + axisHeight + group.height + eventMargin/2;
1565                 top += group.height + eventMargin;
1566             }
1567             else {
1568                 top -= group.height + eventMargin;
1569                 group.top = top;
1570                 group.labelTop = top + (group.height - group.labelHeight) / 2;
1571                 group.lineTop = top - eventMargin/2;
1572             }
1573         }
1574 
1575         // calculate top position of the visible items
1576         for (i = 0, iMax = renderedItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1577             item = renderedItems[i];
1578             group = item.group;
1579 
1580             if (group) {
1581                 item.top = group.top;
1582             }
1583         }
1584 
1585         resized = true;
1586     }
1587 
1588     if (actualHeight < options.minHeight) {
1589         actualHeight = options.minHeight;
1590     }
1591     resized = resized || (actualHeight != size.actualHeight);
1592     size.actualHeight = actualHeight;
1593 
1594     return resized;
1595 };
1596 
1597 /**
1598  * This method clears the (internal) array this.items in a safe way: neatly
1599  * cleaning up the DOM, and accompanying arrays this.renderedItems and
1600  * the created clusters.
1601  */
1602 links.Timeline.prototype.clearItems = function() {
1603     // add all visible items to the list to be hidden
1604     var hideItems = this.renderQueue.hide;
1605     this.renderedItems.forEach(function (item) {
1606         hideItems.push(item);
1607     });
1608 
1609     // clear the cluster generator
1610     this.clusterGenerator.clear();
1611 
1612     // actually clear the items
1613     this.items = [];
1614 };
1615 
1616 /**
1617  * Repaint all items
1618  * @return {boolean} needsReflow   Returns true if the DOM is changed such that
1619  *                                 a reflow is needed.
1620  */
1621 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintItems = function() {
1622     var i, iMax, item, index;
1623 
1624     var needsReflow = false,
1625         dom = this.dom,
1626         size = this.size,
1627         timeline = this,
1628         renderedItems = this.renderedItems;
1629 
1630     if (!dom.items) {
1631         dom.items = {};
1632     }
1633 
1634     // draw the frame containing the items
1635     var frame = dom.items.frame;
1636     if (!frame) {
1637         frame = document.createElement("DIV");
1638         frame.style.position = "relative";
1639         dom.content.appendChild(frame);
1640         dom.items.frame = frame;
1641     }
1642 
1643     frame.style.left = "0px";
1644     frame.style.top = size.items.top + "px";
1645     frame.style.height = "0px";
1646 
1647     // Take frame offline (for faster manipulation of the DOM)
1648     dom.content.removeChild(frame);
1649 
1650     // process the render queue with changes
1651     var queue = this.renderQueue;
1652     var newImageUrls = [];
1653     needsReflow = needsReflow ||
1654         (queue.show.length > 0) ||
1655         (queue.update.length > 0) ||
1656         (queue.hide.length > 0);   // TODO: reflow needed on hide of items?
1657 
1658     while (item = queue.show.shift()) {
1659         item.showDOM(frame);
1660         item.getImageUrls(newImageUrls);
1661         renderedItems.push(item);
1662     }
1663     while (item = queue.update.shift()) {
1664         item.updateDOM(frame);
1665         item.getImageUrls(newImageUrls);
1666         index = this.renderedItems.indexOf(item);
1667         if (index == -1) {
1668             renderedItems.push(item);
1669         }
1670     }
1671     while (item = queue.hide.shift()) {
1672         item.hideDOM(frame);
1673         index = this.renderedItems.indexOf(item);
1674         if (index != -1) {
1675             renderedItems.splice(index, 1);
1676         }
1677     }
1678 
1679     // reposition all visible items
1680     renderedItems.forEach(function (item) {
1681         item.updatePosition(timeline);
1682     });
1683 
1684     // redraw the delete button and dragareas of the selected item (if any)
1685     this.repaintDeleteButton();
1686     this.repaintDragAreas();
1687 
1688     // put frame online again
1689     dom.content.appendChild(frame);
1690 
1691     if (newImageUrls.length) {
1692         // retrieve all image sources from the items, and set a callback once
1693         // all images are retrieved
1694         var callback = function () {
1695             timeline.render();
1696         };
1697         var sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded = false;
1698         links.imageloader.loadAll(newImageUrls, callback, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded);
1699     }
1700 
1701     return needsReflow;
1702 };
1703 
1704 /**
1705  * Reflow the size of the groups
1706  * @return {boolean} resized    Returns true if any of the frame elements
1707  *                              have been resized.
1708  */
1709 links.Timeline.prototype.reflowGroups = function() {
1710     var resized = false,
1711         options = this.options,
1712         size = this.size,
1713         dom = this.dom;
1714 
1715     // calculate the groups width and height
1716     // TODO: only update when data is changed! -> use an updateSeq
1717     var groupsWidth = 0;
1718 
1719     // loop through all groups to get the labels width and height
1720     var groups = this.groups;
1721     var labels = this.dom.groups ? this.dom.groups.labels : [];
1722     for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1723         var group = groups[i];
1724         var label = labels[i];
1725         group.labelWidth  = label ? label.clientWidth : 0;
1726         group.labelHeight = label ? label.clientHeight : 0;
1727         group.width = group.labelWidth;  // TODO: group.width is redundant with labelWidth
1728 
1729         groupsWidth = Math.max(groupsWidth, group.width);
1730     }
1731 
1732     // limit groupsWidth to the groups width in the options
1733     if (options.groupsWidth !== undefined) {
1734         groupsWidth = dom.groups.frame ? dom.groups.frame.clientWidth : 0;
1735     }
1736 
1737     // compensate for the border width. TODO: calculate the real border width
1738     groupsWidth += 1;
1739 
1740     var groupsLeft = options.groupsOnRight ? size.frameWidth - groupsWidth : 0;
1741     resized = resized || (size.groupsWidth !== groupsWidth);
1742     resized = resized || (size.groupsLeft !== groupsLeft);
1743     size.groupsWidth = groupsWidth;
1744     size.groupsLeft = groupsLeft;
1745 
1746     return resized;
1747 };
1748 
1749 /**
1750  * Redraw the group labels
1751  */
1752 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintGroups = function() {
1753     var dom = this.dom,
1754         timeline = this,
1755         options = this.options,
1756         size = this.size,
1757         groups = this.groups;
1758 
1759     if (dom.groups === undefined) {
1760         dom.groups = {};
1761     }
1762 
1763     var labels = dom.groups.labels;
1764     if (!labels) {
1765         labels = [];
1766         dom.groups.labels = labels;
1767     }
1768     var labelLines = dom.groups.labelLines;
1769     if (!labelLines) {
1770         labelLines = [];
1771         dom.groups.labelLines = labelLines;
1772     }
1773     var itemLines = dom.groups.itemLines;
1774     if (!itemLines) {
1775         itemLines = [];
1776         dom.groups.itemLines = itemLines;
1777     }
1778 
1779     // create the frame for holding the groups
1780     var frame = dom.groups.frame;
1781     if (!frame) {
1782         frame =  document.createElement("DIV");
1783         frame.className = "timeline-groups-axis";
1784         frame.style.position = "absolute";
1785         frame.style.overflow = "hidden";
1786         frame.style.top = "0px";
1787         frame.style.height = "100%";
1788 
1789         dom.frame.appendChild(frame);
1790         dom.groups.frame = frame;
1791     }
1792 
1793     frame.style.left = size.groupsLeft + "px";
1794     frame.style.width = (options.groupsWidth !== undefined) ?
1795         options.groupsWidth :
1796         size.groupsWidth + "px";
1797 
1798     // hide groups axis when there are no groups
1799     if (groups.length == 0) {
1800         frame.style.display = 'none';
1801     }
1802     else {
1803         frame.style.display = '';
1804     }
1805 
1806     // TODO: only create/update groups when data is changed.
1807 
1808     // create the items
1809     var current = labels.length,
1810         needed = groups.length;
1811 
1812     // overwrite existing group labels
1813     for (var i = 0, iMax = Math.min(current, needed); i < iMax; i++) {
1814         var group = groups[i];
1815         var label = labels[i];
1816         label.innerHTML = this.getGroupName(group);
1817         label.style.display = '';
1818     }
1819 
1820     // append new items when needed
1821     for (var i = current; i < needed; i++) {
1822         var group = groups[i];
1823 
1824         // create text label
1825         var label = document.createElement("DIV");
1826         label.className = "timeline-groups-text";
1827         label.style.position = "absolute";
1828         if (options.groupsWidth === undefined) {
1829             label.style.whiteSpace = "nowrap";
1830         }
1831         label.innerHTML = this.getGroupName(group);
1832         frame.appendChild(label);
1833         labels[i] = label;
1834 
1835         // create the grid line between the group labels
1836         var labelLine = document.createElement("DIV");
1837         labelLine.className = "timeline-axis-grid timeline-axis-grid-minor";
1838         labelLine.style.position = "absolute";
1839         labelLine.style.left = "0px";
1840         labelLine.style.width = "100%";
1841         labelLine.style.height = "0px";
1842         labelLine.style.borderTopStyle = "solid";
1843         frame.appendChild(labelLine);
1844         labelLines[i] = labelLine;
1845 
1846         // create the grid line between the items
1847         var itemLine = document.createElement("DIV");
1848         itemLine.className = "timeline-axis-grid timeline-axis-grid-minor";
1849         itemLine.style.position = "absolute";
1850         itemLine.style.left = "0px";
1851         itemLine.style.width = "100%";
1852         itemLine.style.height = "0px";
1853         itemLine.style.borderTopStyle = "solid";
1854         dom.content.insertBefore(itemLine, dom.content.firstChild);
1855         itemLines[i] = itemLine;
1856     }
1857 
1858     // remove redundant items from the DOM when needed
1859     for (var i = needed; i < current; i++) {
1860         var label = labels[i],
1861             labelLine = labelLines[i],
1862             itemLine = itemLines[i];
1863 
1864         frame.removeChild(label);
1865         frame.removeChild(labelLine);
1866         dom.content.removeChild(itemLine);
1867     }
1868     labels.splice(needed, current - needed);
1869     labelLines.splice(needed, current - needed);
1870     itemLines.splice(needed, current - needed);
1871 
1872     frame.style.borderStyle = options.groupsOnRight ?
1873         "none none none solid" :
1874         "none solid none none";
1875 
1876     // position the groups
1877     for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1878         var group = groups[i],
1879             label = labels[i],
1880             labelLine = labelLines[i],
1881             itemLine = itemLines[i];
1882 
1883         label.style.top = group.labelTop + "px";
1884         labelLine.style.top = group.lineTop + "px";
1885         itemLine.style.top = group.lineTop + "px";
1886         itemLine.style.width = size.contentWidth + "px";
1887     }
1888 
1889     if (!dom.groups.background) {
1890         // create the axis grid line background
1891         var background = document.createElement("DIV");
1892         background.className = "timeline-axis";
1893         background.style.position = "absolute";
1894         background.style.left = "0px";
1895         background.style.width = "100%";
1896         background.style.border = "none";
1897 
1898         frame.appendChild(background);
1899         dom.groups.background = background;
1900     }
1901     dom.groups.background.style.top = size.axis.top + 'px';
1902     dom.groups.background.style.height = size.axis.height + 'px';
1903 
1904     if (!dom.groups.line) {
1905         // create the axis grid line
1906         var line = document.createElement("DIV");
1907         line.className = "timeline-axis";
1908         line.style.position = "absolute";
1909         line.style.left = "0px";
1910         line.style.width = "100%";
1911         line.style.height = "0px";
1912 
1913         frame.appendChild(line);
1914         dom.groups.line = line;
1915     }
1916     dom.groups.line.style.top = size.axis.line + 'px';
1917 
1918     // create a callback when there are images which are not yet loaded
1919     // TODO: more efficiently load images in the groups
1920     if (dom.groups.frame && groups.length) {
1921         var imageUrls = [];
1922         links.imageloader.filterImageUrls(dom.groups.frame, imageUrls);
1923         if (imageUrls.length) {
1924             // retrieve all image sources from the items, and set a callback once
1925             // all images are retrieved
1926             var callback = function () {
1927                 timeline.render();
1928             };
1929             var sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded = false;
1930             links.imageloader.loadAll(imageUrls, callback, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded);
1931         }
1932     }
1933 };

1936 /**
1937  * Redraw the current time bar
1938  */
1939 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintCurrentTime = function() {
1940     var options = this.options,
1941         dom = this.dom,
1942         size = this.size;
1943 
1944     if (!options.showCurrentTime) {
1945         if (dom.currentTime) {
1946             dom.contentTimelines.removeChild(dom.currentTime);
1947             delete dom.currentTime;
1948         }
1949 
1950         return;
1951     }
1952 
1953     if (!dom.currentTime) {
1954         // create the current time bar
1955         var currentTime = document.createElement("DIV");
1956         currentTime.className = "timeline-currenttime";
1957         currentTime.style.position = "absolute";
1958         currentTime.style.top = "0px";
1959         currentTime.style.height = "100%";
1960 
1961         dom.contentTimelines.appendChild(currentTime);
1962         dom.currentTime = currentTime;
1963     }
1964 
1965     var now = new Date();
1966     var nowOffset = new Date(now.valueOf() + this.clientTimeOffset);
1967     var x = this.timeToScreen(nowOffset);
1968 
1969     var visible = (x > -size.contentWidth && x < 2 * size.contentWidth);
1970     dom.currentTime.style.display = visible ? '' : 'none';
1971     dom.currentTime.style.left = x + "px";
1972     dom.currentTime.title = "Current time: " + nowOffset;
1973 
1974     // start a timer to adjust for the new time
1975     if (this.currentTimeTimer != undefined) {
1976         clearTimeout(this.currentTimeTimer);
1977         delete this.currentTimeTimer;
1978     }
1979     var timeline = this;
1980     var onTimeout = function() {
1981         timeline.repaintCurrentTime();
1982     };
1983     // the time equal to the width of one pixel, divided by 2 for more smoothness
1984     var interval = 1 / this.conversion.factor / 2;
1985     if (interval < 30) interval = 30;
1986     this.currentTimeTimer = setTimeout(onTimeout, interval);
1987 };
1988

1994         dom = this.dom,

1996

1998         if (dom.customTime) {
1999             dom.contentTimelines.removeChild(dom.customTime);
2000             delete dom.customTime;
2001         }
2002 
2003         return;
2004     }
2005 
2006     if (!dom.customTime) {
2007         var customTime = document.createElement("DIV");
2008         customTime.className = "timeline-customtime";
2009         customTime.style.position = "absolute";
2010         customTime.style.top = "0px";
2011         customTime.style.height = "100%";
2012 
2013         var drag = document.createElement("DIV");
2014         drag.style.position = "relative";
2015         drag.style.top = "0px";
2016         drag.style.left = "-10px";
2017         drag.style.height = "100%";
2018         drag.style.width = "20px";
2019         customTime.appendChild(drag);
2020 
2021         dom.contentTimelines.appendChild(customTime);
2022         dom.customTime = customTime;
2023 
2024         // initialize parameter
2025         this.customTime = new Date();
2026     }
2027 
2028     var x = this.timeToScreen(this.customTime),
2029         visible = (x > -size.contentWidth && x < 2 * size.contentWidth);
2030     dom.customTime.style.display = visible ? '' : 'none';
2031     dom.customTime.style.left = x + "px";
2032     dom.customTime.title = "Time: " + this.customTime;

2036 /**
2037  * Redraw the delete button, on the top right of the currently selected item
2038  * if there is no item selected, the button is hidden.
2039  */
2040 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintDeleteButton = function () {
2041     var timeline = this,
2042         dom = this.dom,
2043         frame = dom.items.frame;
2044 
2045     var deleteButton = dom.items.deleteButton;
2046     if (!deleteButton) {
2047         // create a delete button
2048         deleteButton = document.createElement("DIV");
2049         deleteButton.className = "timeline-navigation-delete";
2050         deleteButton.style.position = "absolute";
2051 
2052         frame.appendChild(deleteButton);
2053         dom.items.deleteButton = deleteButton;
2054     }
2055 
2056     var index = this.selection ? this.selection.index : -1,
2057         item = this.selection ? this.items[index] : undefined;
2058     if (item && item.rendered && this.isEditable(item)) {
2059         var right = item.getRight(this),
2060             top = item.top;
2061 
2062         deleteButton.style.left = right + 'px';
2063         deleteButton.style.top = top + 'px';
2064         deleteButton.style.display = '';
2065         frame.removeChild(deleteButton);
2066         frame.appendChild(deleteButton);
2067     }
2068     else {
2069         deleteButton.style.display = 'none';
2070     }
2071 };

2074 /**
2075  * Redraw the drag areas. When an item (ranges only) is selected,
2076  * it gets a drag area on the left and right side, to change its width
2077  */
2078 links.Timeline.prototype.repaintDragAreas = function () {
2079     var timeline = this,
2080         options = this.options,
2081         dom = this.dom,
2082         frame = this.dom.items.frame;
2083 
2084     // create left drag area
2085     var dragLeft = dom.items.dragLeft;
2086     if (!dragLeft) {
2087         dragLeft = document.createElement("DIV");
2088         dragLeft.className="timeline-event-range-drag-left";
2089         dragLeft.style.position = "absolute";
2090 
2091         frame.appendChild(dragLeft);
2092         dom.items.dragLeft = dragLeft;
2093     }
2094 
2095     // create right drag area
2096     var dragRight = dom.items.dragRight;
2097     if (!dragRight) {
2098         dragRight = document.createElement("DIV");
2099         dragRight.className="timeline-event-range-drag-right";
2100         dragRight.style.position = "absolute";
2101 
2102         frame.appendChild(dragRight);
2103         dom.items.dragRight = dragRight;
2104     }
2105 
2106     // reposition left and right drag area
2107     var index = this.selection ? this.selection.index : -1,
2108         item = this.selection ? this.items[index] : undefined;
2109     if (item && item.rendered && this.isEditable(item) &&
2110         (item instanceof links.Timeline.ItemRange)) {
2111         var left = this.timeToScreen(item.start),
2112             right = this.timeToScreen(item.end),
2113             top = item.top,
2114             height = item.height;
2115 
2116         dragLeft.style.left = left + 'px';
2117         dragLeft.style.top = top + 'px';
2118         dragLeft.style.width = options.dragAreaWidth + "px";
2119         dragLeft.style.height = height + 'px';
2120         dragLeft.style.display = '';
2121         frame.removeChild(dragLeft);
2122         frame.appendChild(dragLeft);
2123 
2124         dragRight.style.left = (right - options.dragAreaWidth) + 'px';
2125         dragRight.style.top = top + 'px';
2126         dragRight.style.width = options.dragAreaWidth + "px";
2127         dragRight.style.height = height + 'px';
2128         dragRight.style.display = '';
2129         frame.removeChild(dragRight);
2130         frame.appendChild(dragRight);
2131     }
2132     else {
2133         dragLeft.style.display = 'none';
2134         dragRight.style.display = 'none';
2135     }
2136 };

2147

2160                 navBar.style.right = '10px';
2161             }

2166                 navBar.style.top = '10px';

2202                 timeline.selectItem(index);
2203 
2204                 timeline.applyAdd = true;
2205

2207                 // Note that the change can be canceled from within an event listener if

2300  */

2302     var now = new Date();

2389 links.Timeline.prototype.isEditable = function (item) {
