2400 
2401 /**
2402  * Calculate the factor and offset to convert a position on screen to the
2403  * corresponding date and vice versa.
2404  * After the method calcConversionFactor is executed once, the methods screenToTime and
2405  * timeToScreen can be used.
2406  */
2407 links.Timeline.prototype.recalcConversion = function() {
2408     this.conversion.offset = this.start.valueOf();
2409     this.conversion.factor = this.size.contentWidth /
2410         (this.end.valueOf() - this.start.valueOf());
2411 };
2412 
2413 
2414 /**
2415  * Convert a position on screen (pixels) to a datetime
2416  * Before this method can be used, the method calcConversionFactor must be
2417  * executed once.
2418  * @param {int}     x    Position on the screen in pixels
2419  * @return {Date}   time The datetime the corresponds with given position x
2420  */
2421 links.Timeline.prototype.screenToTime = function(x) {
2422     var conversion = this.conversion;
2423     return new Date(x / conversion.factor + conversion.offset);
2424 };
2425 
2426 /**
2427  * Convert a datetime (Date object) into a position on the screen
2428  * Before this method can be used, the method calcConversionFactor must be
2429  * executed once.
2430  * @param {Date}   time A date
2431  * @return {int}   x    The position on the screen in pixels which corresponds
2432  *                      with the given date.
2433  */
2434 links.Timeline.prototype.timeToScreen = function(time) {
2435     var conversion = this.conversion;
2436     return (time.valueOf() - conversion.offset) * conversion.factor;
2437 };

2441 /**
2442  * Event handler for touchstart event on mobile devices
2443  */
2444 links.Timeline.prototype.onTouchStart = function(event) {
2445     var params = this.eventParams,
2446         me = this;
2447 
2448     if (params.touchDown) {
2449         // if already moving, return
2450         return;
2451     }
2452 
2453     params.touchDown = true;
2454     params.zoomed = false;
2455 
2456     this.onMouseDown(event);
2457 
2458     if (!params.onTouchMove) {
2459         params.onTouchMove = function (event) {me.onTouchMove(event);};
2460         links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "touchmove", params.onTouchMove);
2461     }
2462     if (!params.onTouchEnd) {
2463         params.onTouchEnd  = function (event) {me.onTouchEnd(event);};
2464         links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "touchend",  params.onTouchEnd);
2465     }
2466 
2467     /* TODO
2468      // check for double tap event
2469      var delta = 500; // ms
2470      var doubleTapStart = (new Date()).valueOf();
2471      var target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2472      var doubleTapItem = this.getItemIndex(target);
2473      if (params.doubleTapStart &&
2474      (doubleTapStart - params.doubleTapStart) < delta &&
2475      doubleTapItem == params.doubleTapItem) {
2476      delete params.doubleTapStart;
2477      delete params.doubleTapItem;
2478      me.onDblClick(event);
2479      params.touchDown = false;
2480      }
2481      params.doubleTapStart = doubleTapStart;
2482      params.doubleTapItem = doubleTapItem;
2483      */
2484     // store timing for double taps
2485     var target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2486     var item = this.getItemIndex(target);
2487     params.doubleTapStartPrev = params.doubleTapStart;
2488     params.doubleTapStart = (new Date()).valueOf();
2489     params.doubleTapItemPrev = params.doubleTapItem;
2490     params.doubleTapItem = item;
2491 
2492     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2493 };

2495 /**
2496  * Event handler for touchmove event on mobile devices
2497  */
2498 links.Timeline.prototype.onTouchMove = function(event) {
2499     var params = this.eventParams;
2500 
2501     if (event.scale && event.scale !== 1) {
2502         params.zoomed = true;
2503     }
2504 
2505     if (!params.zoomed) {
2506         // move 
2507         this.onMouseMove(event);
2508     }
2509     else {
2510         if (this.options.zoomable) {
2511             // pinch
2512             // TODO: pinch only supported on iPhone/iPad. Create something manually for Android?
2513             params.zoomed = true;
2514 
2515             var scale = event.scale,
2516                 oldWidth = (params.end.valueOf() - params.start.valueOf()),
2517                 newWidth = oldWidth / scale,
2518                 diff = newWidth - oldWidth,
2519                 start = new Date(parseInt(params.start.valueOf() - diff/2)),
2520                 end = new Date(parseInt(params.end.valueOf() + diff/2));
2521 
2522             // TODO: determine zoom-around-date from touch positions?
2523 
2524             this.setVisibleChartRange(start, end);
2525             this.trigger("rangechange");
2526         }
2527     }
2528 
2529     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2530 };
2531 
2532 /**
2533  * Event handler for touchend event on mobile devices
2534  */
2535 links.Timeline.prototype.onTouchEnd = function(event) {
2536     var params = this.eventParams;
2537     var me = this;
2538     params.touchDown = false;
2539 
2540     if (params.zoomed) {
2541         this.trigger("rangechanged");
2542     }
2543 
2544     if (params.onTouchMove) {
2545         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "touchmove", params.onTouchMove);
2546         delete params.onTouchMove;
2547 
2548     }
2549     if (params.onTouchEnd) {
2550         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "touchend",  params.onTouchEnd);
2551         delete params.onTouchEnd;
2552     }
2553 
2554     this.onMouseUp(event);
2555 
2556     // check for double tap event
2557     var delta = 500; // ms
2558     var doubleTapEnd = (new Date()).valueOf();
2559     var target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2560     var doubleTapItem = this.getItemIndex(target);
2561     if (params.doubleTapStartPrev &&
2562         (doubleTapEnd - params.doubleTapStartPrev) < delta &&
2563         params.doubleTapItem == params.doubleTapItemPrev) {
2564         params.touchDown = true;
2565         me.onDblClick(event);
2566         params.touchDown = false;
2567     }
2568 
2569     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2570 };

2573 /**
2574  * Start a moving operation inside the provided parent element
2575  * @param {Event} event       The event that occurred (required for
2576  *                             retrieving the  mouse position)
2577  */
2578 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseDown = function(event) {
2579     event = event || window.event;
2580 
2581     var params = this.eventParams,
2582         options = this.options,
2583         dom = this.dom;
2584 
2585     // only react on left mouse button down
2586     var leftButtonDown = event.which ? (event.which == 1) : (event.button == 1);
2587     if (!leftButtonDown && !params.touchDown) {
2588         return;
2589     }
2590 
2591     // get mouse position
2592     params.mouseX = links.Timeline.getPageX(event);
2593     params.mouseY = links.Timeline.getPageY(event);
2594     params.frameLeft = links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft(this.dom.content);
2595     params.frameTop = links.Timeline.getAbsoluteTop(this.dom.content);
2596     params.previousLeft = 0;
2597     params.previousOffset = 0;
2598 
2599     params.moved = false;
2600     params.start = new Date(this.start.valueOf());
2601     params.end = new Date(this.end.valueOf());
2602 
2603     params.target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2604     var dragLeft = (dom.items && dom.items.dragLeft) ? dom.items.dragLeft : undefined;
2605     var dragRight = (dom.items && dom.items.dragRight) ? dom.items.dragRight : undefined;
2606     params.itemDragLeft = (params.target === dragLeft);
2607     params.itemDragRight = (params.target === dragRight);
2608 
2609     if (params.itemDragLeft || params.itemDragRight) {
2610         params.itemIndex = this.selection ? this.selection.index : undefined;
2611     }
2612     else {
2613         params.itemIndex = this.getItemIndex(params.target);
2614     }
2615 
2616     params.customTime = (params.target === dom.customTime ||
2617         params.target.parentNode === dom.customTime) ?
2618         this.customTime :
2619         undefined;
2620 
2621     params.addItem = (options.editable && event.ctrlKey);
2622     if (params.addItem) {
2623         // create a new event at the current mouse position
2624         var x = params.mouseX - params.frameLeft;
2625         var y = params.mouseY - params.frameTop;
2626 
2627         var xstart = this.screenToTime(x);
2628         if (options.snapEvents) {
2629             this.step.snap(xstart);
2630         }
2631         var xend = new Date(xstart.valueOf());
2632         var content = options.NEW;
2633         var group = this.getGroupFromHeight(y);
2634         this.addItem({
2635             'start': xstart,
2636             'end': xend,
2637             'content': content,
2638             'group': this.getGroupName(group)
2639         });
2640         params.itemIndex = (this.items.length - 1);
2641         this.selectItem(params.itemIndex);
2642         params.itemDragRight = true;
2643     }
2644 
2645     var item = this.items[params.itemIndex];
2646     var isSelected = this.isSelected(params.itemIndex);
2647     params.editItem = isSelected && this.isEditable(item);
2648     if (params.editItem) {
2649         params.itemStart = item.start;
2650         params.itemEnd = item.end;
2651         params.itemGroup = item.group;
2652         params.itemLeft = item.start ? this.timeToScreen(item.start) : undefined;
2653         params.itemRight = item.end ? this.timeToScreen(item.end) : undefined;
2654     }
2655     else {
2656         this.dom.frame.style.cursor = 'move';
2657     }
2658     if (!params.touchDown) {
2659         // add event listeners to handle moving the contents
2660         // we store the function onmousemove and onmouseup in the timeline, so we can
2661         // remove the eventlisteners lateron in the function mouseUp()
2662         var me = this;
2663         if (!params.onMouseMove) {
2664             params.onMouseMove = function (event) {me.onMouseMove(event);};
2665             links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "mousemove", params.onMouseMove);
2666         }
2667         if (!params.onMouseUp) {
2668             params.onMouseUp = function (event) {me.onMouseUp(event);};
2669             links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "mouseup", params.onMouseUp);
2670         }
2671 
2672         links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2673     }
2674 };
2675 
2676 
2677 /**
2678  * Perform moving operating.
2679  * This function activated from within the funcion links.Timeline.onMouseDown().
2680  * @param {Event}   event  Well, eehh, the event
2681  */
2682 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseMove = function (event) {
2683     event = event || window.event;
2684 
2685     var params = this.eventParams,
2686         size = this.size,
2687         dom = this.dom,
2688         options = this.options;
2689 
2690     // calculate change in mouse position
2691     var mouseX = links.Timeline.getPageX(event);
2692     var mouseY = links.Timeline.getPageY(event);
2693 
2694     if (params.mouseX == undefined) {
2695         params.mouseX = mouseX;
2696     }
2697     if (params.mouseY == undefined) {
2698         params.mouseY = mouseY;
2699     }
2700 
2701     var diffX = mouseX - params.mouseX;
2702     var diffY = mouseY - params.mouseY;
2703 
2704     // if mouse movement is big enough, register it as a "moved" event
2705     if (Math.abs(diffX) >= 1) {
2706         params.moved = true;
2707     }
2708 
2709     if (params.customTime) {
2710         var x = this.timeToScreen(params.customTime);
2711         var xnew = x + diffX;
2712         this.customTime = this.screenToTime(xnew);
2713         this.repaintCustomTime();
2714 
2715         // fire a timechange event
2716         this.trigger('timechange');
2717     }
2718     else if (params.editItem) {
2719         var item = this.items[params.itemIndex],
2720             left,
2721             right;
2722 
2723         if (params.itemDragLeft) {
2724             // move the start of the item
2725             left = params.itemLeft + diffX;
2726             right = params.itemRight;
2727 
2728             item.start = this.screenToTime(left);
2729             if (options.snapEvents) {
2730                 this.step.snap(item.start);
2731                 left = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
2732             }
2733 
2734             if (left > right) {
2735                 left = right;
2736                 item.start = this.screenToTime(left);
2737             }
2738         }
2739         else if (params.itemDragRight) {
2740             // move the end of the item
2741             left = params.itemLeft;
2742             right = params.itemRight + diffX;
2743 
2744             item.end = this.screenToTime(right);
2745             if (options.snapEvents) {
2746                 this.step.snap(item.end);
2747                 right = this.timeToScreen(item.end);
2748             }
2749 
2750             if (right < left) {
2751                 right = left;
2752                 item.end = this.screenToTime(right);
2753             }
2754         }
2755         else {
2756             // move the item
2757             left = params.itemLeft + diffX;
2758             item.start = this.screenToTime(left);
2759             if (options.snapEvents) {
2760                 this.step.snap(item.start);
2761                 left = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
2762             }
2763 
2764             if (item.end) {
2765                 right = left + (params.itemRight - params.itemLeft);
2766                 item.end = this.screenToTime(right);
2767             }
2768         }
2769 
2770         item.setPosition(left, right);
2771 
2772         var dragging = params.itemDragLeft || params.itemDragRight;
2773         if (this.groups.length && !dragging) {
2774             // move item from one group to another when needed
2775             var y = mouseY - params.frameTop;
2776             var group = this.getGroupFromHeight(y);
2777             if (options.groupsChangeable && item.group !== group) {
2778                 // move item to the other group
2779                 var index = this.items.indexOf(item);
2780                 this.changeItem(index, {'group': this.getGroupName(group)});
2781             }
2782             else {
2783                 this.repaintDeleteButton();
2784                 this.repaintDragAreas();
2785             }
2786         }
2787         else {
2788             // TODO: does not work well in FF, forces redraw with every mouse move it seems
2789             this.render(); // TODO: optimize, only redraw the items?
2790             // Note: when animate==true, no redraw is needed here, its done by stackItems animation
2791         }
2792     }
2793     else if (options.moveable) {
2794         var interval = (params.end.valueOf() - params.start.valueOf());
2795         var diffMillisecs = Math.round((-diffX) / size.contentWidth * interval);
2796         var newStart = new Date(params.start.valueOf() + diffMillisecs);
2797         var newEnd = new Date(params.end.valueOf() + diffMillisecs);
2798         this.applyRange(newStart, newEnd);
2799         // if the applied range is moved due to a fixed min or max,
2800         // change the diffMillisecs accordingly
2801         var appliedDiff = (this.start.valueOf() - newStart.valueOf());
2802         if (appliedDiff) {
2803             diffMillisecs += appliedDiff;
2804         }
2805 
2806         this.recalcConversion();
2807 
2808         // move the items by changing the left position of their frame.
2809         // this is much faster than repositioning all elements individually via the 
2810         // repaintFrame() function (which is done once at mouseup)
2811         // note that we round diffX to prevent wrong positioning on millisecond scale
2812         var previousLeft = params.previousLeft || 0;
2813         var currentLeft = parseFloat(dom.items.frame.style.left) || 0;
2814         var previousOffset = params.previousOffset || 0;
2815         var frameOffset = previousOffset + (currentLeft - previousLeft);
2816         var frameLeft = -diffMillisecs / interval * size.contentWidth + frameOffset;
2817 
2818         dom.items.frame.style.left = (frameLeft) + "px";
2819 
2820         // read the left again from DOM (IE8- rounds the value)
2821         params.previousOffset = frameOffset;
2822         params.previousLeft = parseFloat(dom.items.frame.style.left) || frameLeft;
2823 
2824         this.repaintCurrentTime();
2825         this.repaintCustomTime();
2826         this.repaintAxis();
2827 
2828         // fire a rangechange event
2829         this.trigger('rangechange');
2830     }
2831 
2832     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2833 };
2834 
2835 
2836 /**
2837  * Stop moving operating.
2838  * This function activated from within the funcion links.Timeline.onMouseDown().
2839  * @param {event}  event   The event
2840  */
2841 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseUp = function (event) {
2842     var params = this.eventParams,
2843         options = this.options;
2844 
2845     event = event || window.event;
2846 
2847     this.dom.frame.style.cursor = 'auto';
2848 
2849     // remove event listeners here, important for Safari
2850     if (params.onMouseMove) {
2851         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "mousemove", params.onMouseMove);
2852         delete params.onMouseMove;
2853     }
2854     if (params.onMouseUp) {
2855         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "mouseup",   params.onMouseUp);
2856         delete params.onMouseUp;
2857     }
2858     //links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2859 
2860     if (params.customTime) {
2861         // fire a timechanged event
2862         this.trigger('timechanged');
2863     }
2864     else if (params.editItem) {
2865         var item = this.items[params.itemIndex];
2866 
2867         if (params.moved || params.addItem) {
2868             this.applyChange = true;
2869             this.applyAdd = true;
2870 
2871             this.updateData(params.itemIndex, {
2872                 'start': item.start,
2873                 'end': item.end
2874             });
2875 
2876             // fire an add or change event. 
2877             // Note that the change can be canceled from within an event listener if 
2878             // this listener calls the method cancelChange().
2879             this.trigger(params.addItem ? 'add' : 'change');
2880 
2881             if (params.addItem) {
2882                 if (this.applyAdd) {
2883                     this.updateData(params.itemIndex, {
2884                         'start': item.start,
2885                         'end': item.end,
2886                         'content': item.content,
2887                         'group': this.getGroupName(item.group)
2888                     });
2889                 }
2890                 else {
2891                     // undo an add
2892                     this.deleteItem(params.itemIndex);
2893                 }
2894             }
2895             else {
2896                 if (this.applyChange) {
2897                     this.updateData(params.itemIndex, {
2898                         'start': item.start,
2899                         'end': item.end
2900                     });
2901                 }
2902                 else {
2903                     // undo a change
2904                     delete this.applyChange;
2905                     delete this.applyAdd;
2906 
2907                     var item = this.items[params.itemIndex],
2908                         domItem = item.dom;
2909 
2910                     item.start = params.itemStart;
2911                     item.end = params.itemEnd;
2912                     item.group = params.itemGroup;
2913                     // TODO: original group should be restored too
2914                     item.setPosition(params.itemLeft, params.itemRight);
2915                 }
2916             }
2917 
2918             // prepare data for clustering, by filtering and sorting by type
2919             if (this.options.cluster) {
2920                 this.clusterGenerator.updateData();
2921             }
2922 
2923             this.render();
2924         }
2925     }
2926     else {
2927         if (!params.moved && !params.zoomed) {
2928             // mouse did not move -> user has selected an item
2929 
2930             if (params.target === this.dom.items.deleteButton) {
2931                 // delete item
2932                 if (this.selection) {
2933                     this.confirmDeleteItem(this.selection.index);
2934                 }
2935             }
2936             else if (options.selectable) {
2937                 // select/unselect item
2938                 if (params.itemIndex != undefined) {
2939                     if (!this.isSelected(params.itemIndex)) {
2940                         this.selectItem(params.itemIndex);
2941                         this.trigger('select');
2942                     }
2943                 }
2944                 else {
2945                     this.unselectItem();
2946                     this.trigger('select');
2947                 }
2948             }
2949         }
2950         else {
2951             // timeline is moved
2952             // TODO: optimize: no need to reflow and cluster again?
2953             this.render();
2954 
2955             if ((params.moved && options.moveable) || (params.zoomed && options.zoomable) ) {
2956                 // fire a rangechanged event
2957                 this.trigger('rangechanged');
2958             }
2959         }
2960     }
2961 };

2963 /**
2964  * Double click event occurred for an item
2965  * @param {Event}  event
2966  */
2967 links.Timeline.prototype.onDblClick = function (event) {
2968     var params = this.eventParams,
2969         options = this.options,
2970         dom = this.dom,
2971         size = this.size;
2972     event = event || window.event;
2973 
2974     if (params.itemIndex != undefined) {
2975         var item = this.items[params.itemIndex];
2976         if (item && this.isEditable(item)) {
2977             // fire the edit event
2978             this.trigger('edit');
2979         }
2980     }
2981     else {
2982         if (options.editable) {
2983             // create a new item
2984 
2985             // get mouse position
2986             params.mouseX = links.Timeline.getPageX(event);
2987             params.mouseY = links.Timeline.getPageY(event);
2988             var x = params.mouseX - links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft(dom.content);
2989             var y = params.mouseY - links.Timeline.getAbsoluteTop(dom.content);
2990 
2991             // create a new event at the current mouse position
2992             var xstart = this.screenToTime(x);
2993             var xend = this.screenToTime(x  + size.frameWidth / 10); // add 10% of timeline width
2994             if (options.snapEvents) {
2995                 this.step.snap(xstart);
2996                 this.step.snap(xend);
2997             }
2998 
2999             var content = options.NEW;
3000             var group = this.getGroupFromHeight(y);   // (group may be undefined)
3001             var preventRender = true;
3002             this.addItem({
3003                 'start': xstart,
3004                 'end': xend,
3005                 'content': content,
3006                 'group': this.getGroupName(group)
3007             }, preventRender);
3008             params.itemIndex = (this.items.length - 1);
3009             this.selectItem(params.itemIndex);
3010 
3011             this.applyAdd = true;
3012 
3013             // fire an add event.
3014             // Note that the change can be canceled from within an event listener if
3015             // this listener calls the method cancelAdd().
3016             this.trigger('add');
3017 
3018             if (this.applyAdd) {
3019                 // render and select the item
3020                 this.render({animate: false});
3021                 this.selectItem(params.itemIndex);
3022             }
3023             else {
3024                 // undo an add
3025                 this.deleteItem(params.itemIndex);
3026             }
3027         }
3028     }
3029 
3030     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
3031 };

3034 /**
3035  * Event handler for mouse wheel event, used to zoom the timeline
3036  * Code from http://adomas.org/javascript-mouse-wheel/
3037  * @param {Event}  event   The event
3038  */
3039 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseWheel = function(event) {
3040     if (!this.options.zoomable)
3041         return;
3042 
3043     if (!event) { /* For IE. */
3044         event = window.event;
3045     }
3046 
3047     // retrieve delta    
3048     var delta = 0;
3049     if (event.wheelDelta) { /* IE/Opera. */
3050         delta = event.wheelDelta/120;
3051     } else if (event.detail) { /* Mozilla case. */
3052         // In Mozilla, sign of delta is different than in IE.
3053         // Also, delta is multiple of 3.
3054         delta = -event.detail/3;
3055     }
3056 
3057     // If delta is nonzero, handle it.
3058     // Basically, delta is now positive if wheel was scrolled up,
3059     // and negative, if wheel was scrolled down.
3060     if (delta) {
3061         // TODO: on FireFox, the window is not redrawn within repeated scroll-events 
3062         // -> use a delayed redraw? Make a zoom queue?
3063 
3064         var timeline = this;
3065         var zoom = function () {
3066             // perform the zoom action. Delta is normally 1 or -1
3067             var zoomFactor = delta / 5.0;
3068             var frameLeft = links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft(timeline.dom.content);
3069             var mouseX = links.Timeline.getPageX(event);
3070             var zoomAroundDate =
3071                 (mouseX != undefined && frameLeft != undefined) ?
3072                     timeline.screenToTime(mouseX - frameLeft) :
3073                     undefined;
3074 
3075             timeline.zoom(zoomFactor, zoomAroundDate);
3076 
3077             // fire a rangechange and a rangechanged event
3078             timeline.trigger("rangechange");
3079             timeline.trigger("rangechanged");
3080         };
3081 
3082         zoom();
3083     }
3084 
3085     // Prevent default actions caused by mouse wheel.
3086     // That might be ugly, but we handle scrolls somehow
3087     // anyway, so don't bother here...
3088     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
3089 };

3092 /**
3093  * Zoom the timeline the given zoomfactor in or out. Start and end date will
3094  * be adjusted, and the timeline will be redrawn. You can optionally give a
3095  * date around which to zoom.
3096  * For example, try zoomfactor = 0.1 or -0.1
3097  * @param {Number} zoomFactor      Zooming amount. Positive value will zoom in,
3098  *                                 negative value will zoom out
3099  * @param {Date}   zoomAroundDate  Date around which will be zoomed. Optional
3100  */
3101 links.Timeline.prototype.zoom = function(zoomFactor, zoomAroundDate) {
3102     // if zoomAroundDate is not provided, take it half between start Date and end Date
3103     if (zoomAroundDate == undefined) {
3104         zoomAroundDate = new Date((this.start.valueOf() + this.end.valueOf()) / 2);
3105     }
3106 
3107     // prevent zoom factor larger than 1 or smaller than -1 (larger than 1 will
3108     // result in a start>=end )
3109     if (zoomFactor >= 1) {
3110         zoomFactor = 0.9;
3111     }
3112     if (zoomFactor <= -1) {
3113         zoomFactor = -0.9;
3114     }
3115 
3116     // adjust a negative factor such that zooming in with 0.1 equals zooming
3117     // out with a factor -0.1
3118     if (zoomFactor < 0) {
3119         zoomFactor = zoomFactor / (1 + zoomFactor);
3120     }
3121 
3122     // zoom start Date and end Date relative to the zoomAroundDate
3123     var startDiff = (this.start.valueOf() - zoomAroundDate);
3124     var endDiff = (this.end.valueOf() - zoomAroundDate);
3125 
3126     // calculate new dates
3127     var newStart = new Date(this.start.valueOf() - startDiff * zoomFactor);
3128     var newEnd   = new Date(this.end.valueOf() - endDiff * zoomFactor);
3129 
3130     // only zoom in when interval is larger than minimum interval (to prevent
3131     // sliding to left/right when having reached the minimum zoom level)
3132     var interval = (newEnd.valueOf() - newStart.valueOf());
3133     var zoomMin = Number(this.options.zoomMin) || 10;
3134     if (zoomMin < 10) {
3135         zoomMin = 10;
3136     }
3137     if (interval >= zoomMin) {
3138         this.applyRange(newStart, newEnd, zoomAroundDate);
3139         this.render({
3140             animate: this.options.animate && this.options.animateZoom
3141         });
3142     }
3143 };
3144 
3145 /**
3146  * Move the timeline the given movefactor to the left or right. Start and end
3147  * date will be adjusted, and the timeline will be redrawn.
3148  * For example, try moveFactor = 0.1 or -0.1
3149  * @param {Number}  moveFactor      Moving amount. Positive value will move right,
3150  *                                 negative value will move left
3151  */
3152 links.Timeline.prototype.move = function(moveFactor) {
3153     // zoom start Date and end Date relative to the zoomAroundDate
3154     var diff = (this.end.valueOf() - this.start.valueOf());
3155 
3156     // apply new dates
3157     var newStart = new Date(this.start.valueOf() + diff * moveFactor);
3158     var newEnd   = new Date(this.end.valueOf() + diff * moveFactor);
3159     this.applyRange(newStart, newEnd);
3160 
3161     this.render(); // TODO: optimize, no need to reflow, only to recalc conversion and repaint
3162 };
3163 
3164 /**
3165  * Apply a visible range. The range is limited to feasible maximum and minimum
3166  * range.
3167  * @param {Date} start
3168  * @param {Date} end
3169  * @param {Date}   zoomAroundDate  Optional. Date around which will be zoomed.
3170  */
3171 links.Timeline.prototype.applyRange = function (start, end, zoomAroundDate) {
3172     // calculate new start and end value
3173     var startValue = start.valueOf(); // number
3174     var endValue = end.valueOf();     // number
3175     var interval = (endValue - startValue);
3176 
3177     // determine maximum and minimum interval
3178     var options = this.options;
3179     var year = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365;
3180     var zoomMin = Number(options.zoomMin) || 10;
3181     if (zoomMin < 10) {
3182         zoomMin = 10;
3183     }
3184     var zoomMax = Number(options.zoomMax) || 10000 * year;
3185     if (zoomMax > 10000 * year) {
3186         zoomMax = 10000 * year;
3187     }
3188     if (zoomMax < zoomMin) {
3189         zoomMax = zoomMin;
3190     }
3191 
3192     // determine min and max date value
3193     var min = options.min ? options.min.valueOf() : undefined; // number
3194     var max = options.max ? options.max.valueOf() : undefined; // number
3195     if (min != undefined && max != undefined) {
3196         if (min >= max) {
3197             // empty range
3198             var day = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24;
3199             max = min + day;
3200         }
3201         if (zoomMax > (max - min)) {
3202             zoomMax = (max - min);
3203         }
3204         if (zoomMin > (max - min)) {
3205             zoomMin = (max - min);
3206         }
3207     }
3208 
3209     // prevent empty interval
3210     if (startValue >= endValue) {
3211         endValue += 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24;
3212     }
3213 
3214     // prevent too small scale
3215     // TODO: IE has problems with milliseconds
3216     if (interval < zoomMin) {
3217         var diff = (zoomMin - interval);
3218         var f = zoomAroundDate ? (zoomAroundDate.valueOf() - startValue) / interval : 0.5;
3219         startValue -= Math.round(diff * f);
3220         endValue   += Math.round(diff * (1 - f));
3221     }
3222 
3223     // prevent too large scale
3224     if (interval > zoomMax) {
3225         var diff = (interval - zoomMax);
3226         var f = zoomAroundDate ? (zoomAroundDate.valueOf() - startValue) / interval : 0.5;
3227         startValue += Math.round(diff * f);
3228         endValue   -= Math.round(diff * (1 - f));
3229     }
3230 
3231     // prevent to small start date
3232     if (min != undefined) {
3233         var diff = (startValue - min);
3234         if (diff < 0) {
3235             startValue -= diff;
3236             endValue -= diff;
3237         }
3238     }
3239 
3240     // prevent to large end date
3241     if (max != undefined) {
3242         var diff = (max - endValue);
3243         if (diff < 0) {
3244             startValue += diff;
3245             endValue += diff;
3246         }
3247     }
3248 
3249     // apply new dates
3250     this.start = new Date(startValue);
3251     this.end = new Date(endValue);
3252 };
3253 
3254 /**
3255  * Delete an item after a confirmation.
3256  * The deletion can be cancelled by executing .cancelDelete() during the
3257  * triggered event 'delete'.
3258  * @param {int} index   Index of the item to be deleted
3259  */
3260 links.Timeline.prototype.confirmDeleteItem = function(index) {
3261     this.applyDelete = true;
3262 
3263     // select the event to be deleted
3264     if (!this.isSelected(index)) {
3265         this.selectItem(index);
3266     }
3267 
3268     // fire a delete event trigger. 
3269     // Note that the delete event can be canceled from within an event listener if 
3270     // this listener calls the method cancelChange().
3271     this.trigger('delete');
3272 
3273     if (this.applyDelete) {
3274         this.deleteItem(index);
3275     }
3276 
3277     delete this.applyDelete;
3278 };
3279 
3280 /**
3281  * Delete an item
3282  * @param {int} index   Index of the item to be deleted
3283  * @param {boolean} [preventRender=false]   Do not re-render timeline if true
3284  *                                          (optimization for multiple delete)
3285  */
3286 links.Timeline.prototype.deleteItem = function(index, preventRender) {
3287     if (index >= this.items.length) {
3288         throw "Cannot delete row, index out of range";
3289     }
3290 
3291     if (this.selection) {
3292         // adjust the selection
3293         if (this.selection.index == index) {
3294             // item to be deleted is selected
3295             this.unselectItem();
3296         }
3297         else if (this.selection.index > index) {
3298             // update selection index
3299             this.selection.index--;
3300         }
3301     }
3302 
3303     // actually delete the item and remove it from the DOM
3304     var item = this.items.splice(index, 1)[0];
3305     this.renderQueue.hide.push(item);
3306 
3307     // delete the row in the original data table
3308     if (this.data) {
3309         if (google && google.visualization &&
3310             this.data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
3311             this.data.removeRow(index);
3312         }
3313         else if (links.Timeline.isArray(this.data)) {
3314             this.data.splice(index, 1);
3315         }
3316         else {
3317             throw "Cannot delete row from data, unknown data type";
3318         }
3319     }
3320 
3321     // prepare data for clustering, by filtering and sorting by type
3322     if (this.options.cluster) {
3323         this.clusterGenerator.updateData();
3324     }
3325 
3326     if (!preventRender) {
3327         this.render();
3328     }
3329 };

3332 /**
3333  * Delete all items
3334  */
3335 links.Timeline.prototype.deleteAllItems = function() {
3336     this.unselectItem();
3337 
3338     // delete the loaded items
3339     this.clearItems();
3340 
3341     // delete the groups
3342     this.deleteGroups();
3343 
3344     // empty original data table
3345     if (this.data) {
3346         if (google && google.visualization &&
3347             this.data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
3348             this.data.removeRows(0, this.data.getNumberOfRows());
3349         }
3350         else if (links.Timeline.isArray(this.data)) {
3351             this.data.splice(0, this.data.length);
3352         }
3353         else {
3354             throw "Cannot delete row from data, unknown data type";
3355         }
3356     }
3357 
3358     // prepare data for clustering, by filtering and sorting by type
3359     if (this.options.cluster) {
3360         this.clusterGenerator.updateData();
3361     }
3362 
3363     this.render();
3364 };

3367 /**
3368  * Find the group from a given height in the timeline
3369  * @param {Number} height   Height in the timeline
3370  * @return {Object | undefined} group   The group object, or undefined if out
3371  *                                      of range
3372  */
3373 links.Timeline.prototype.getGroupFromHeight = function(height) {
3374     var i,
3375         group,
3376         groups = this.groups;
3377 
3378     if (groups.length) {
3379         if (this.options.axisOnTop) {
3380             for (i = groups.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
3381                 group = groups[i];
3382                 if (height > group.top) {
3383                     return group;
3384                 }
3385             }
3386         }
3387         else {
3388             for (i = 0; i < groups.length; i++) {
3389                 group = groups[i];
3390                 if (height > group.top) {
3391                     return group;
3392                 }
3393             }
3394         }
3395 
3396         return group; // return the last group
3397     }
3398 
3399     return undefined;
3400 };
3401 
3402 /**
3403  * @constructor links.Timeline.Item
3404  * @param {Object} data       Object containing parameters start, end
3405  *                            content, group. type, group.
3406  * @param {Object} [options]  Options to set initial property values
3407  *                                {Number} top
3408  *                                {Number} left
3409  *                                {Number} width
3410  *                                {Number} height
3411  */
3412 links.Timeline.Item = function (data, options) {
3413     if (data) {
3414         /* TODO: use parseJSONDate as soon as it is tested and working (in two directions)
3415          this.start = links.Timeline.parseJSONDate(data.start);
3416          this.end = links.Timeline.parseJSONDate(data.end);
3417          */
3418         this.start = data.start;
3419         this.end = data.end;
3420         this.content = data.content;
3421         this.className = data.className;
3422         this.editable = data.editable;
3423         this.group = data.group;
3424     }
3425     this.top = 0;
3426     this.left = 0;
3427     this.width = 0;
3428     this.height = 0;
3429     this.lineWidth = 0;
3430     this.dotWidth = 0;
3431     this.dotHeight = 0;
3432 
3433     this.rendered = false; // true when the item is draw in the Timeline DOM
3434 
3435     if (options) {
3436         // override the default properties
3437         for (var option in options) {
3438             if (options.hasOwnProperty(option)) {
3439                 this[option] = options[option];
3440             }
3441         }
3442     }
3443 
3444 };
3445

3591 /**
3592  * Reflow the Item: retrieve its actual size from the DOM
3593  * @return {boolean} resized    returns true if the axis is resized
3594  * @override
3595  */
3596 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.reflow = function () {
3597     var dom = this.dom,
3598         dotHeight = dom.dot.offsetHeight,
3599         dotWidth = dom.dot.offsetWidth,
3600         lineWidth = dom.line.offsetWidth,
3601         resized = (
3602             (this.dotHeight != dotHeight) ||
3603                 (this.dotWidth != dotWidth) ||
3604                 (this.lineWidth != lineWidth)
3605             );
3606 
3607     this.dotHeight = dotHeight;
3608     this.dotWidth = dotWidth;
3609     this.lineWidth = lineWidth;
3610 
3611     return resized;
3612 };

3618 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.select = function () {
3619     var dom = this.dom;
3620     links.Timeline.addClassName(dom, 'timeline-event-selected');
3621     links.Timeline.addClassName(dom.line, 'timeline-event-selected');
3622     links.Timeline.addClassName(dom.dot, 'timeline-event-selected');
3623 };

3627  * @override

3629 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.unselect = function () {
3630     var dom = this.dom;
3631     links.Timeline.removeClassName(dom, 'timeline-event-selected');
3632     links.Timeline.removeClassName(dom.line, 'timeline-event-selected');
3633     links.Timeline.removeClassName(dom.dot, 'timeline-event-selected');

3636 /**
3637  * Creates the DOM for the item, depending on its type
3638  * @return {Element | undefined}
3639  * @override
3640  */
3641 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.createDOM = function () {
3642     // background box
3643     var divBox = document.createElement("DIV");
3644     divBox.style.position = "absolute";
3645     divBox.style.left = this.left + "px";
3646     divBox.style.top = this.top + "px";
3647 
3648     // contents box (inside the background box). used for making margins
3649     var divContent = document.createElement("DIV");
3650     divContent.className = "timeline-event-content";
3651     divContent.innerHTML = this.content;
3652     divBox.appendChild(divContent);
3653 
3654     // line to axis
3655     var divLine = document.createElement("DIV");
3656     divLine.style.position = "absolute";
3657     divLine.style.width = "0px";
3658     // important: the vertical line is added at the front of the list of elements,
3659     // so it will be drawn behind all boxes and ranges
3660     divBox.line = divLine;
3661 
3662     // dot on axis
3663     var divDot = document.createElement("DIV");
3664     divDot.style.position = "absolute";
3665     divDot.style.width  = "0px";
3666     divDot.style.height = "0px";
3667     divBox.dot = divDot;
3668 
3669     this.dom = divBox;
3670     this.updateDOM();
3671 
3672     return divBox;
3673 };
3674 
3675 /**
3676  * Append the items DOM to the given HTML container. If items DOM does not yet
3677  * exist, it will be created first.
3678  * @param {Element} container
3679  * @override
3680  */
3681 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.showDOM = function (container) {
3682     var dom = this.dom;
3683     if (!dom) {
3684         dom = this.createDOM();
3685     }
3686 
3687     if (dom.parentNode != container) {
3688         if (dom.parentNode) {
3689             // container is changed. remove from old container
3690             this.hideDOM();
3691         }
3692 
3693         // append to this container
3694         container.appendChild(dom);
3695         container.insertBefore(dom.line, container.firstChild);
3696         // Note: line must be added in front of the this,
3697         //       such that it stays below all this
3698         container.appendChild(dom.dot);
3699         this.rendered = true;
3700     }
3701 };
3702 
3703 /**
3704  * Remove the items DOM from the current HTML container, but keep the DOM in
3705  * memory
3706  * @override
3707  */
3708 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.hideDOM = function () {
3709     var dom = this.dom;
3710     if (dom) {
3711         if (dom.parentNode) {
3712             dom.parentNode.removeChild(dom);
3713         }
3714         if (dom.line && dom.line.parentNode) {
3715             dom.line.parentNode.removeChild(dom.line);
3716         }
3717         if (dom.dot && dom.dot.parentNode) {
3718             dom.dot.parentNode.removeChild(dom.dot);
3719         }
3720         this.rendered = false;
3721     }
3722 };
3723 
3724 /**
3725  * Update the DOM of the item. This will update the content and the classes
3726  * of the item
3727  * @override
3728  */
3729 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.updateDOM = function () {
3730     var divBox = this.dom;
3731     if (divBox) {
3732         var divLine = divBox.line;
3733         var divDot = divBox.dot;
3734 
3735         // update contents
3736         divBox.firstChild.innerHTML = this.content;
3737 
3738         // update class
3739         divBox.className = "timeline-event timeline-event-box";
3740         divLine.className = "timeline-event timeline-event-line";
3741         divDot.className  = "timeline-event timeline-event-dot";
3742 
3743         if (this.isCluster) {
3744             links.Timeline.addClassName(divBox, 'timeline-event-cluster');
3745             links.Timeline.addClassName(divLine, 'timeline-event-cluster');
3746             links.Timeline.addClassName(divDot, 'timeline-event-cluster');
3747         }
3748 
3749         // add item specific class name when provided
3750         if (this.className) {
3751             links.Timeline.addClassName(divBox, this.className);
3752             links.Timeline.addClassName(divLine, this.className);
3753             links.Timeline.addClassName(divDot, this.className);
3754         }
3755 
3756         // TODO: apply selected className?
3757     }
3758 };
3759 
3760 /**
3761  * Reposition the item, recalculate its left, top, and width, using the current
3762  * range of the timeline and the timeline options.
3763  * @param {links.Timeline} timeline
3764  * @override
3765  */
3766 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.updatePosition = function (timeline) {
3767     var dom = this.dom;
3768     if (dom) {
3769         var left = timeline.timeToScreen(this.start),
3770             axisOnTop = timeline.options.axisOnTop,
3771             axisTop = timeline.size.axis.top,
3772             axisHeight = timeline.size.axis.height,
3773             boxAlign = (timeline.options.box && timeline.options.box.align) ?
3774                 timeline.options.box.align : undefined;
3775 
3776         dom.style.top = this.top + "px";
3777         if (boxAlign == 'right') {
3778             dom.style.left = (left - this.width) + "px";
3779         }
3780         else if (boxAlign == 'left') {
3781             dom.style.left = (left) + "px";
3782         }
3783         else { // default or 'center'
3784             dom.style.left = (left - this.width/2) + "px";
3785         }
3786 
3787         var line = dom.line;
3788         var dot = dom.dot;
3789         line.style.left = (left - this.lineWidth/2) + "px";
3790         dot.style.left = (left - this.dotWidth/2) + "px";
3791         if (axisOnTop) {
3792             line.style.top = axisHeight + "px";
3793             line.style.height = Math.max(this.top - axisHeight, 0) + "px";
3794             dot.style.top = (axisHeight - this.dotHeight/2) + "px";
3795         }
3796         else {
3797             line.style.top = (this.top + this.height) + "px";
3798             line.style.height = Math.max(axisTop - this.top - this.height, 0) + "px";
3799             dot.style.top = (axisTop - this.dotHeight/2) + "px";
3800         }
3801     }
3802 };
3803 
3804 /**
3805  * Check if the item is visible in the timeline, and not part of a cluster
3806  * @param {Date} start
3807  * @param {Date} end
3808  * @return {Boolean} visible
3809  * @override
3810  */
3811 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.isVisible = function (start, end) {
3812     if (this.cluster) {
3813         return false;
3814     }
3815 
3816     return (this.start > start) && (this.start < end);
3817 };
3818 
3819 /**
3820  * Reposition the item
3821  * @param {Number} left
3822  * @param {Number} right
3823  * @override
3824  */
3825 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.setPosition = function (left, right) {
3826     var dom = this.dom;
3827 
3828     dom.style.left = (left - this.width / 2) + "px";
3829     dom.line.style.left = (left - this.lineWidth / 2) + "px";
3830     dom.dot.style.left = (left - this.dotWidth / 2) + "px";
3831 
3832     if (this.group) {
3833         this.top = this.group.top;
3834         dom.style.top = this.top + 'px';
3835     }
3836 };
3837 
3838 /**
3839  * Calculate the right position of the item
3840  * @param {links.Timeline} timeline
3841  * @return {Number} right
3842  * @override
3843  */
3844 links.Timeline.ItemBox.prototype.getRight = function (timeline) {
3845     var boxAlign = (timeline.options.box && timeline.options.box.align) ?
3846         timeline.options.box.align : undefined;
3847 
3848     var left = timeline.timeToScreen(this.start);
3849     var right;
3850     if (boxAlign == 'right') {
3851         right = left;
3852     }
3853     else if (boxAlign == 'left') {
3854         right = (left + this.width);
3855     }
3856     else { // default or 'center'
3857         right = (left + this.width / 2);
3858     }
3859 
3860     return right;
3861 };

3985 /**
3986  * Reposition the item, recalculate its left, top, and width, using the current
3987  * range of the timeline and the timeline options. *
3988  * @param {links.Timeline} timeline
3989  * @override
3990  */
3991 links.Timeline.ItemRange.prototype.updatePosition = function (timeline) {
3992     var dom = this.dom;
3993     if (dom) {
3994         var contentWidth = timeline.size.contentWidth,
3995             left = timeline.timeToScreen(this.start),
3996             right = timeline.timeToScreen(this.end);
3997 
3998         // limit the width of the this, as browsers cannot draw very wide divs
3999         if (left < -contentWidth) {
4000             left = -contentWidth;
4001         }
4002         if (right > 2 * contentWidth) {
4003             right = 2 * contentWidth;
4004         }
4005 
4006         dom.style.top = this.top + "px";
4007         dom.style.left = left + "px";
4008         //dom.style.width = Math.max(right - left - 2 * this.borderWidth, 1) + "px"; // TODO: borderWidth
4009         dom.style.width = Math.max(right - left, 1) + "px";
4010     }
4011 };
4012 
4013 /**
4014  * Check if the item is visible in the timeline, and not part of a cluster
4015  * @param {Number} start
4016  * @param {Number} end
4017  * @return {boolean} visible
4018  * @override
4019  */
4020 links.Timeline.ItemRange.prototype.isVisible = function (start, end) {
4021     if (this.cluster) {
4022         return false;
4023     }
4024 
4025     return (this.end > start)
4026         && (this.start < end);
4027 };
4028 
4029 /**
4030  * Reposition the item
4031  * @param {Number} left
4032  * @param {Number} right
4033  * @override
4034  */
4035 links.Timeline.ItemRange.prototype.setPosition = function (left, right) {
4036     var dom = this.dom;
4037 
4038     dom.style.left = left + 'px';
4039     dom.style.width = (right - left) + 'px';
4040 
4041     if (this.group) {
4042         this.top = this.group.top;
4043         dom.style.top = this.top + 'px';
4044     }
4045 };
4046 
4047 /**
4048  * Calculate the right position of the item
4049  * @param {links.Timeline} timeline
4050  * @return {Number} right
4051  * @override
4052  */
4053 links.Timeline.ItemRange.prototype.getRight = function (timeline) {
4054     return timeline.timeToScreen(this.end);
4055 };
4056 
4057 /**
4058  * Calculate the width of the item
4059  * @param {links.Timeline} timeline
4060  * @return {Number} width
4061  * @override
4062  */
4063 links.Timeline.ItemRange.prototype.getWidth = function (timeline) {
4064     return timeline.timeToScreen(this.end) - timeline.timeToScreen(this.start);
4065 };

4130 links.Timeline.ItemDot.prototype.createDOM = function () {

4156 /**
4157  * Append the items DOM to the given HTML container. If items DOM does not yet
4158  * exist, it will be created first.
4159  * @param {Element} container
4160  * @override
4161  */
4162 links.Timeline.ItemDot.prototype.showDOM = function (container) {
4163     var dom = this.dom;
4164     if (!dom) {
4165         dom = this.createDOM();
4166     }
4167 
4168     if (dom.parentNode != container) {
4169         if (dom.parentNode) {
4170             // container changed. remove it from old container first
4171             this.hideDOM();
4172         }
4173 
4174         // append to container
4175         container.appendChild(dom);
4176         this.rendered = true;
4177     }
4178 };

4182  * @override
4183  */
4184 links.Timeline.ItemDot.prototype.hideDOM = function () {
4185     var dom = this.dom;
4186     if (dom) {
4187         if (dom.parentNode) {
4188             dom.parentNode.removeChild(dom);
4189         }
4190         this.rendered = false;
4191     }

4218             links.Timeline.addClassName(divDot, this.className);

4231 links.Timeline.ItemDot.prototype.updatePosition = function (timeline) {

4240         //dom.content.style.marginRight = (0.5 * this.dotWidth) + "px"; // TODO

4288 /**
4289  * Retrieve the properties of an item.
4290  * @param {Number} index
4291  * @return {Object} properties   Object containing item properties:<br>
4292  *                              {Date} start (required),
4293  *                              {Date} end (optional),
4294  *                              {String} content (required),
4295  *                              {String} group (optional),
4296  *                              {String} className (optional)
4297  *                              {boolean} editable (optional)
4298  */
4299 links.Timeline.prototype.getItem = function (index) {
4300     if (index >= this.items.length) {
4301         throw "Cannot get item, index out of range";
4302     }
4303 
4304     var item = this.items[index];
4305 
4306     var properties = {};
4307     properties.start = new Date(item.start.valueOf());
4308     if (item.end) {
4309         properties.end = new Date(item.end.valueOf());
4310     }
4311     properties.content = item.content;
4312     if (item.group) {
4313         properties.group = this.getGroupName(item.group);
4314     }
4315     if ('className' in item) {
4316         properties.className = this.getGroupName(item.className);
4317     }
4318     if (item.hasOwnProperty('editable') && (typeof item.editable != 'undefined')) {
4319         properties.editable = item.editable;
4320     }
4321 
4322     return properties;
4323 };

4325 /**
4326  * Add a new item.
4327  * @param {Object} itemData     Object containing item properties:<br>
4328  *                              {Date} start (required),
4329  *                              {Date} end (optional),
4330  *                              {String} content (required),
4331  *                              {String} group (optional)
4332  * @param {boolean} [preventRender=false]   Do not re-render timeline if true
4333  */
4334 links.Timeline.prototype.addItem = function (itemData, preventRender) {
4335     var itemsData = [
4336         itemData
4337     ];
4338 
4339     this.addItems(itemsData, preventRender);
4340 };
4341 
4342 /**
4343  * Add new items.
4344  * @param {Array} itemsData An array containing Objects.
4345  *                          The objects must have the following parameters:
4346  *                            {Date} start,
4347  *                            {Date} end,
4348  *                            {String} content with text or HTML code,
4349  *                            {String} group
4350  * @param {boolean} [preventRender=false]   Do not re-render timeline if true
4351  */
4352 links.Timeline.prototype.addItems = function (itemsData, preventRender) {
4353     var timeline = this,
4354         items = this.items;
4355 
4356     // append the items
4357     itemsData.forEach(function (itemData) {
4358         var index = items.length;
4359         items.push(timeline.createItem(itemData));
4360         timeline.updateData(index, itemData);
4361 
4362         // note: there is no need to add the item to the renderQueue, that
4363         // will be done when this.render() is executed and all items are
4364         // filtered again.
4365     });
4366 
4367     // prepare data for clustering, by filtering and sorting by type
4368     if (this.options.cluster) {
4369         this.clusterGenerator.updateData();
4370     }
4371 
4372     if (!preventRender) {
4373         this.render({
4374             animate: false
4375         });
4376     }
4377 };
4378 
4379 /**
4380  * Create an item object, containing all needed parameters
4381  * @param {Object} itemData  Object containing parameters start, end
4382  *                           content, group.
4383  * @return {Object} item
4384  */
4385 links.Timeline.prototype.createItem = function(itemData) {
4386     var type = itemData.end ? 'range' : this.options.style;
4387     var data = {
4388         start: itemData.start,
4389         end: itemData.end,
4390         content: itemData.content,
4391         className: itemData.className,
4392         editable: itemData.editable,
4393         group: this.getGroup(itemData.group)
4394     };
4395     // TODO: optimize this, when creating an item, all data is copied twice...
4396 
4397     // TODO: is initialTop needed?
4398     var initialTop,
4399         options = this.options;
4400     if (options.axisOnTop) {
4401         initialTop = this.size.axis.height + options.eventMarginAxis + options.eventMargin / 2;
4402     }
4403     else {
4404         initialTop = this.size.contentHeight - options.eventMarginAxis - options.eventMargin / 2;
4405     }
4406 
4407     if (type in this.itemTypes) {
4408         return new this.itemTypes[type](data, {'top': initialTop})
4409     }
4410 
4411     console.log('ERROR: Unknown event style "' + type + '"');
4412     return new links.Timeline.Item(data, {
4413         'top': initialTop
4414     });
4415 };
4416 
4417 /**
4418  * Edit an item
4419  * @param {Number} index
4420  * @param {Object} itemData     Object containing item properties:<br>
4421  *                              {Date} start (required),
4422  *                              {Date} end (optional),
4423  *                              {String} content (required),
4424  *                              {String} group (optional)
4425  * @param {boolean} [preventRender=false]   Do not re-render timeline if true
4426  */
4427 links.Timeline.prototype.changeItem = function (index, itemData, preventRender) {
4428     var oldItem = this.items[index];
4429     if (!oldItem) {
4430         throw "Cannot change item, index out of range";
4431     }
4432 
4433     // replace item, merge the changes
4434     var newItem = this.createItem({
4435         'start':   itemData.hasOwnProperty('start') ?   itemData.start :   oldItem.start,
4436         'end':     itemData.hasOwnProperty('end') ?     itemData.end :     oldItem.end,
4437         'content': itemData.hasOwnProperty('content') ? itemData.content : oldItem.content,
4438         'group':   itemData.hasOwnProperty('group') ?   itemData.group :   this.getGroupName(oldItem.group),
4439         'className': itemData.hasOwnProperty('className') ? itemData.className : oldItem.className,
4440         'editable': itemData.hasOwnProperty('editable') ? itemData.editable : oldItem.editable
4441     });
4442     this.items[index] = newItem;
4443 
4444     // append the changes to the render queue
4445     this.renderQueue.hide.push(oldItem);
4446     this.renderQueue.show.push(newItem);
4447 
4448     // update the original data table
4449     this.updateData(index, itemData);
4450 
4451     // prepare data for clustering, by filtering and sorting by type
4452     if (this.options.cluster) {
4453         this.clusterGenerator.updateData();
4454     }
4455 
4456     if (!preventRender) {
4457         // redraw timeline
4458         this.render({
4459             animate: false
4460         });
4461 
4462         newItem.select();
4463     }
4464 };

4466 /**
4467  * Delete all groups
4468  */
4469 links.Timeline.prototype.deleteGroups = function () {
4470     this.groups = [];
4471     this.groupIndexes = {};
4472 };

4475 /**
4476  * Get a group by the group name. When the group does not exist,
4477  * it will be created.
4478  * @param {String} groupName   the name of the group
4479  * @return {Object} groupObject
4480  */
4481 links.Timeline.prototype.getGroup = function (groupName) {
4482     var groups = this.groups,
4483         groupIndexes = this.groupIndexes,
4484         groupObj = undefined;
4485 
4486     var groupIndex = groupIndexes[groupName];
4487     if (groupIndex == undefined && groupName != undefined) { // not null or undefined
4488         groupObj = {
4489             'content': groupName,
4490             'labelTop': 0,
4491             'lineTop': 0
4492             // note: this object will lateron get addition information, 
4493             //       such as height and width of the group         
4494         };
4495         groups.push(groupObj);
4496         // sort the groups
4497         groups = groups.sort(function (a, b) {
4498             if (a.content > b.content) {
4499                 return 1;
4500             }
4501             if (a.content < b.content) {
4502                 return -1;
4503             }
4504             return 0;
4505         });
4506 
4507         // rebuilt the groupIndexes
4508         for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4509             groupIndexes[groups[i].content] = i;
4510         }
4511     }
4512     else {
4513         groupObj = groups[groupIndex];
4514     }
4515 
4516     return groupObj;
4517 };
4518 
4519 /**
4520  * Get the group name from a group object.
4521  * @param {Object} groupObj
4522  * @return {String} groupName   the name of the group, or undefined when group
4523  *                              was not provided
4524  */
4525 links.Timeline.prototype.getGroupName = function (groupObj) {
4526     return groupObj ? groupObj.content : undefined;
4527 };

4558 /**
4559  * Select an event. The visible chart range will be moved such that the selected
4560  * event is placed in the middle.
4561  * For example selection = [{row: 5}];
4562  * @param {Array} selection   An array with a column row, containing the row
4563  *                           number (the id) of the event to be selected.
4564  * @return {boolean}         true if selection is succesfully set, else false.
4565  */
4566 links.Timeline.prototype.setSelection = function(selection) {
4567     if (selection != undefined && selection.length > 0) {
4568         if (selection[0].row != undefined) {
4569             var index = selection[0].row;
4570             if (this.items[index]) {
4571                 var item = this.items[index];
4572                 this.selectItem(index);
4573 
4574                 // move the visible chart range to the selected event.
4575                 var start = item.start;
4576                 var end = item.end;
4577                 var middle; // number
4578                 if (end != undefined) {
4579                     middle = (end.valueOf() + start.valueOf()) / 2;
4580                 } else {
4581                     middle = start.valueOf();
4582                 }
4583                 var diff = (this.end.valueOf() - this.start.valueOf()),
4584                     newStart = new Date(middle - diff/2),
4585                     newEnd = new Date(middle + diff/2);
4586 
4587                 this.setVisibleChartRange(newStart, newEnd);
4588 
4589                 return true;
4590             }
4591         }
4592     }
4593     else {
4594         // unselect current selection
4595         this.unselectItem();
4596     }
4597     return false;
4598 };
4599 
4600 /**
4601  * Retrieve the currently selected event
4602  * @return {Array} sel  An array with a column row, containing the row number
4603  *                      of the selected event. If there is no selection, an
4604  *                      empty array is returned.
4605  */
4606 links.Timeline.prototype.getSelection = function() {
4607     var sel = [];
4608     if (this.selection) {
4609         sel.push({"row": this.selection.index});
4610     }
4611     return sel;
4612 };

4626             domItem = item.dom;

4630         };

4636             }

4641     }

4672 
4673 /**
4674  * Stack the items such that they don't overlap. The items will have a minimal
4675  * distance equal to options.eventMargin.
4676  * @param {boolean | undefined} animate    if animate is true, the items are
4677  *                                         moved to their new position animated
4678  *                                         defaults to false.
4679  */
4680 links.Timeline.prototype.stackItems = function(animate) {
4681     if (this.groups.length > 0) {
4682         // under this conditions we refuse to stack the events
4683         // TODO: implement support for stacking items per group
4684         return;
4685     }
4686 
4687     if (animate == undefined) {
4688         animate = false;
4689     }
4690 
4691     // calculate the order and final stack position of the items
4692     var stack = this.stack;
4693     if (!stack) {
4694         stack = {};
4695         this.stack = stack;
4696     }
4697     stack.sortedItems = this.stackOrder(this.renderedItems);
4698     stack.finalItems = this.stackCalculateFinal(stack.sortedItems);
4699 
4700     if (animate || stack.timer) {
4701         // move animated to the final positions
4702         var timeline = this;
4703         var step = function () {
4704             var arrived = timeline.stackMoveOneStep(stack.sortedItems,
4705                 stack.finalItems);
4706 
4707             timeline.repaint();
4708 
4709             if (!arrived) {
4710                 stack.timer = setTimeout(step, 30);
4711             }
4712             else {
4713                 delete stack.timer;
4714             }
4715         };
4716 
4717         if (!stack.timer) {
4718             stack.timer = setTimeout(step, 30);
4719         }
4720     }
4721     else {
4722         // move immediately to the final positions
4723         this.stackMoveToFinal(stack.sortedItems, stack.finalItems);
4724     }
4725 };
4726 
4727 /**
4728  * Cancel any running animation
4729  */
4730 links.Timeline.prototype.stackCancelAnimation = function() {
4731     if (this.stack && this.stack.timer) {
4732         clearTimeout(this.stack.timer);
4733         delete this.stack.timer;
4734     }
4735 };
4736 
4737 
4738 /**
4739  * Order the items in the array this.items. The default order is determined via:
4740  * - Ranges go before boxes and dots.
4741  * - The item with the oldest start time goes first
4742  * If a custom function has been provided via the stackorder option, then this will be used.
4743  * @param {Array} items        Array with items
4744  * @return {Array} sortedItems Array with sorted items
4745  */
4746 links.Timeline.prototype.stackOrder = function(items) {
4747     // TODO: store the sorted items, to have less work later on
4748     var sortedItems = items.concat([]);
4749 
4750     //if a customer stack order function exists, use it. 
4751     var f = this.options.customStackOrder && (typeof this.options.customStackOrder === 'function') ? this.options.customStackOrder : function (a, b)
4752     {
4753         if ((a instanceof links.Timeline.ItemRange) &&
4754             !(b instanceof links.Timeline.ItemRange)) {
4755             return -1;
4756         }
4757 
4758         if (!(a instanceof links.Timeline.ItemRange) &&
4759             (b instanceof links.Timeline.ItemRange)) {
4760             return 1;
4761         }
4762 
4763         return (a.left - b.left);
4764     };
4765 
4766     sortedItems.sort(f);
4767 
4768     return sortedItems;
4769 };
4770 
4771 /**
4772  * Adjust vertical positions of the events such that they don't overlap each
4773  * other.
4774  * @param {timeline.Item[]} items
4775  * @return {Object[]} finalItems
4776  */
4777 links.Timeline.prototype.stackCalculateFinal = function(items) {
4778     var i,
4779         iMax,
4780         size = this.size,
4781         axisTop = size.axis.top,
4782         axisHeight = size.axis.height,
4783         options = this.options,
4784         axisOnTop = options.axisOnTop,
4785         eventMargin = options.eventMargin,
4786         eventMarginAxis = options.eventMarginAxis,
4787         finalItems = [];
4788 
4789     // initialize final positions
4790     for (i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4791         var item = items[i],
4792             top,
4793             bottom,
4794             height = item.height,
4795             width = item.getWidth(this),
4796             right = item.getRight(this),
4797             left = right - width;
4798 
4799         if (axisOnTop) {
4800             top = axisHeight + eventMarginAxis + eventMargin / 2;
4801         }
4802         else {
4803             top = axisTop - height - eventMarginAxis - eventMargin / 2;
4804         }
4805         bottom = top + height;
4806 
4807         finalItems[i] = {
4808             'left': left,
4809             'top': top,
4810             'right': right,
4811             'bottom': bottom,
4812             'height': height,
4813             'item': item
4814         };
4815     }
4816 
4817     if (this.options.stackEvents) {
4818         // calculate new, non-overlapping positions
4819         //var items = sortedItems;
4820         for (i = 0, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4821             //for (var i = finalItems.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
4822             var finalItem = finalItems[i];
4823             var collidingItem = null;
4824             do {
4825                 // TODO: optimize checking for overlap. when there is a gap without items,
4826                 //  you only need to check for items from the next item on, not from zero
4827                 collidingItem = this.stackItemsCheckOverlap(finalItems, i, 0, i-1);
4828                 if (collidingItem != null) {
4829                     // There is a collision. Reposition the event above the colliding element
4830                     if (axisOnTop) {
4831                         finalItem.top = collidingItem.top + collidingItem.height + eventMargin;
4832                     }
4833                     else {
4834                         finalItem.top = collidingItem.top - finalItem.height - eventMargin;
4835                     }
4836                     finalItem.bottom = finalItem.top + finalItem.height;
4837                 }
4838             } while (collidingItem);
4839         }
4840     }
4841 
4842     return finalItems;
4843 };
4844 
4845 
4846 /**
4847  * Move the events one step in the direction of their final positions
4848  * @param {Array} currentItems   Array with the real items and their current
4849  *                               positions
4850  * @param {Array} finalItems     Array with objects containing the final
4851  *                               positions of the items
4852  * @return {boolean} arrived     True if all items have reached their final
4853  *                               location, else false
4854  */
4855 links.Timeline.prototype.stackMoveOneStep = function(currentItems, finalItems) {
4856     var arrived = true;
4857 
4858     // apply new positions animated
4859     for (i = 0, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4860         var finalItem = finalItems[i],
4861             item = finalItem.item;
4862 
4863         var topNow = parseInt(item.top);
4864         var topFinal = parseInt(finalItem.top);
4865         var diff = (topFinal - topNow);
4866         if (diff) {
4867             var step = (topFinal == topNow) ? 0 : ((topFinal > topNow) ? 1 : -1);
4868             if (Math.abs(diff) > 4) step = diff / 4;
4869             var topNew = parseInt(topNow + step);
4870 
4871             if (topNew != topFinal) {
4872                 arrived = false;
4873             }
4874 
4875             item.top = topNew;
4876             item.bottom = item.top + item.height;
4877         }
4878         else {
4879             item.top = finalItem.top;
4880             item.bottom = finalItem.bottom;
4881         }
4882 
4883         item.left = finalItem.left;
4884         item.right = finalItem.right;
4885     }
4886 
4887     return arrived;
4888 };
4889 
4890 
4891 
4892 /**
4893  * Move the events from their current position to the final position
4894  * @param {Array} currentItems   Array with the real items and their current
4895  *                               positions
4896  * @param {Array} finalItems     Array with objects containing the final
4897  *                               positions of the items
4898  */
4899 links.Timeline.prototype.stackMoveToFinal = function(currentItems, finalItems) {
4900     // Put the events directly at there final position
4901     for (i = 0, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4902         var finalItem = finalItems[i],
4903             current = finalItem.item;
4904 
4905         current.left = finalItem.left;
4906         current.top = finalItem.top;
4907         current.right = finalItem.right;
4908         current.bottom = finalItem.bottom;
4909     }
4910 };
4911 
4912 
4913 
4914 /**
4915  * Check if the destiny position of given item overlaps with any
4916  * of the other items from index itemStart to itemEnd.
4917  * @param {Array} items      Array with items
4918  * @param {int}  itemIndex   Number of the item to be checked for overlap
4919  * @param {int}  itemStart   First item to be checked.
4920  * @param {int}  itemEnd     Last item to be checked.
4921  * @return {Object}          colliding item, or undefined when no collisions
4922  */
4923 links.Timeline.prototype.stackItemsCheckOverlap = function(items, itemIndex,
4924                                                            itemStart, itemEnd) {
4925     var eventMargin = this.options.eventMargin,
4926         collision = this.collision;
4927 
4928     // we loop from end to start, as we suppose that the chance of a 
4929     // collision is larger for items at the end, so check these first.
4930     var item1 = items[itemIndex];
4931     for (var i = itemEnd; i >= itemStart; i--) {
4932         var item2 = items[i];
4933         if (collision(item1, item2, eventMargin)) {
4934             if (i != itemIndex) {
4935                 return item2;
4936             }
4937         }
4938     }
4939 
4940     return undefined;
4941 };
4942 
4943 /**
4944  * Test if the two provided items collide
4945  * The items must have parameters left, right, top, and bottom.
4946  * @param {Element} item1       The first item
4947  * @param {Element} item2       The second item
4948  * @param {Number}              margin  A minimum required margin. Optional.
4949  *                              If margin is provided, the two items will be
4950  *                              marked colliding when they overlap or
4951  *                              when the margin between the two is smaller than
4952  *                              the requested margin.
4953  * @return {boolean}            true if item1 and item2 collide, else false
4954  */
4955 links.Timeline.prototype.collision = function(item1, item2, margin) {
4956     // set margin if not specified 
4957     if (margin == undefined) {
4958         margin = 0;
4959     }
4960 
4961     // calculate if there is overlap (collision)
4962     return (item1.left - margin < item2.right &&
4963         item1.right + margin > item2.left &&
4964         item1.top - margin < item2.bottom &&
4965         item1.bottom + margin > item2.top);
4966 };
4967 
4968 
4969 /**
4970  * fire an event
4971  * @param {String} event   The name of an event, for example "rangechange" or "edit"
4972  */
4973 links.Timeline.prototype.trigger = function (event) {
4974     // built up properties
4975     var properties = null;
4976     switch (event) {
4977         case 'rangechange':
4978         case 'rangechanged':
4979             properties = {
4980                 'start': new Date(this.start.valueOf()),
4981                 'end': new Date(this.end.valueOf())
4982             };
4983             break;
4984 
4985         case 'timechange':
4986         case 'timechanged':
4987             properties = {
4988                 'time': new Date(this.customTime.valueOf())
4989             };
4990             break;
4991     }
4992 
4993     // trigger the links event bus
4994     links.events.trigger(this, event, properties);
4995 
4996     // trigger the google event bus
4997     if (google && google.visualization) {
4998         google.visualization.events.trigger(this, event, properties);
4999     }
5000 };
5001 
5002 
5003 /**
5004  * Cluster the events
5005  */
5006 links.Timeline.prototype.clusterItems = function () {
5007     if (!this.options.cluster) {
5008         return;
5009     }
5010 
5011     var clusters = this.clusterGenerator.getClusters(this.conversion.factor);
5012     if (this.clusters != clusters) {
5013         // cluster level changed
5014         var queue = this.renderQueue;
5015 
5016         // remove the old clusters from the scene
5017         if (this.clusters) {
5018             this.clusters.forEach(function (cluster) {
5019                 queue.hide.push(cluster);
5020 
5021                 // unlink the items
5022                 cluster.items.forEach(function (item) {
5023                     item.cluster = undefined;
5024                 });
5025             });
5026         }
5027 
5028         // append the new clusters
5029         clusters.forEach(function (cluster) {
5030             // don't add to the queue.show here, will be done in .filterItems()
5031 
5032             // link all items to the cluster
5033             cluster.items.forEach(function (item) {
5034                 item.cluster = cluster;
5035             });
5036         });
5037 
5038         this.clusters = clusters;
5039     }
5040 };
5041 
5042 /**
5043  * Filter the visible events
5044  */
5045 links.Timeline.prototype.filterItems = function () {
5046     var queue = this.renderQueue,
5047         window = (this.end - this.start),
5048         start = new Date(this.start.valueOf() - window),
5049         end = new Date(this.end.valueOf() + window);
5050 
5051     function filter (arr) {
5052         arr.forEach(function (item) {
5053             var rendered = item.rendered;
5054             var visible = item.isVisible(start, end);
5055             if (rendered != visible) {
5056                 if (rendered) {
5057                     queue.hide.push(item); // item is rendered but no longer visible
5058                 }
5059                 if (visible && (queue.show.indexOf(item) == -1)) {
5060                     queue.show.push(item); // item is visible but neither rendered nor queued up to be rendered
5061                 }
5062             }
5063         });
5064     }
5065 
5066     // filter all items and all clusters
5067     filter(this.items);
5068     if (this.clusters) {
5069         filter(this.clusters);
5070     }
5071 };
