5075 /**
5076  * @constructor links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator
5077  * Generator which creates clusters of items, based on the visible range in
5078  * the Timeline. There is a set of cluster levels which is cached.
5079  * @param {links.Timeline} timeline
5080  */
5081 links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator = function (timeline) {
5082     this.timeline = timeline;
5083     this.clear();
5084 };
5085 
5086 /**
5087  * Clear all cached clusters and data, and initialize all variables
5088  */
5089 links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator.prototype.clear = function () {
5090     // cache containing created clusters for each cluster level
5091     this.items = [];
5092     this.groups = {};
5093     this.clearCache();
5094 };
5095 
5096 /**
5097  * Clear the cached clusters
5098  */
5099 links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator.prototype.clearCache = function () {
5100     // cache containing created clusters for each cluster level
5101     this.cache = {};
5102     this.cacheLevel = -1;
5103     this.cache[this.cacheLevel] = [];
5104 };
5105 
5106 /**
5107  * Set the items to be clustered.
5108  * This will clear cached clusters.
5109  * @param {Item[]} items
5110  * @param {Object} [options]  Available options:
5111  *                            {boolean} applyOnChangedLevel
5112  *                                If true (default), the changed data is applied
5113  *                                as soon the cluster level changes. If false,
5114  *                                The changed data is applied immediately
5115  */
5116 links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator.prototype.setData = function (items, options) {
5117     this.items = items || [];
5118     this.dataChanged = true;
5119     this.applyOnChangedLevel = true;
5120     if (options && options.applyOnChangedLevel) {
5121         this.applyOnChangedLevel = options.applyOnChangedLevel;
5122     }
5123     // console.log('clustergenerator setData applyOnChangedLevel=' + this.applyOnChangedLevel); // TODO: cleanup
5124 };
5125 
5126 /**
5127  * Update the current data set: clear cache, and recalculate the clustering for
5128  * the current level
5129  */
5130 links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator.prototype.updateData = function () {
5131     this.dataChanged = true;
5132     this.applyOnChangedLevel = false;
5133 };
5134 
5135 /**
5136  * Filter the items per group.
5137  * @private
5138  */
5139 links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator.prototype.filterData = function () {
5140     // filter per group
5141     var items = this.items || [];
5142     var groups = {};
5143     this.groups = groups;
5144 
5145     // split the items per group
5146     items.forEach(function (item) {
5147         // put the item in the correct group
5148         var groupName = item.group ? item.group.content : '';
5149         var group = groups[groupName];
5150         if (!group) {
5151             group = [];
5152             groups[groupName] = group;
5153         }
5154         group.push(item);
5155 
5156         // calculate the center of the item
5157         if (item.start) {
5158             if (item.end) {
5159                 // range
5160                 item.center = (item.start.valueOf() + item.end.valueOf()) / 2;
5161             }
5162             else {
5163                 // box, dot
5164                 item.center = item.start.valueOf();
5165             }
5166         }
5167     });
5168 
5169     // sort the items per group
5170     for (var groupName in groups) {
5171         if (groups.hasOwnProperty(groupName)) {
5172             groups[groupName].sort(function (a, b) {
5173                 return (a.center - b.center);
5174             });
5175         }
5176     }
5177 
5178     this.dataChanged = false;
5179 };
5180 
5181 /**
5182  * Cluster the events which are too close together
5183  * @param {Number} scale     The scale of the current window,
5184  *                           defined as (windowWidth / (endDate - startDate))
5185  * @return {Item[]} clusters
5186  */
5187 links.Timeline.ClusterGenerator.prototype.getClusters = function (scale) {
5188     var level = -1,
5189         granularity = 2, // TODO: what granularity is needed for the cluster levels?
5190         timeWindow = 0,  // milliseconds
5191         maxItems = 5;    // TODO: do not hard code maxItems
5192 
5193     if (scale > 0) {
5194         level = Math.round(Math.log(100 / scale) / Math.log(granularity));
5195         timeWindow = Math.pow(granularity, level);
5196 
5197         // groups must have a larger time window, as the items will not be stacked
5198         if (this.timeline.groups && this.timeline.groups.length) {
5199             timeWindow *= 4;
5200         }
5201     }
5202 
5203     // clear the cache when and re-filter the data when needed.
5204     if (this.dataChanged) {
5205         var levelChanged = (level != this.cacheLevel);
5206         var applyDataNow = this.applyOnChangedLevel ? levelChanged : true;
5207         if (applyDataNow) {
5208             // TODO: currently drawn clusters should be removed! mark them as invisible?
5209             this.clearCache();
5210             this.filterData();
5211             // console.log('clustergenerator: cache cleared...'); // TODO: cleanup
5212         }
5213     }
5214 
5215     this.cacheLevel = level;
5216     var clusters = this.cache[level];
5217     if (!clusters) {
5218         // console.log('clustergenerator: create cluster level ' + level); // TODO: cleanup
5219         clusters = [];
5220 
5221         // TODO: spit this method, it is too large
5222         for (var groupName in this.groups) {
5223             if (this.groups.hasOwnProperty(groupName)) {
5224                 var items = this.groups[groupName];
5225                 var iMax = items.length;
5226                 var i = 0;
5227                 while (i < iMax) {
5228                     // find all items around current item, within the timeWindow
5229                     var item = items[i];
5230                     var neighbors = 1;  // start at 1, to include itself)
5231 
5232                     // loop through items left from the current item
5233                     var j = i - 1;
5234                     while (j >= 0 && (item.center - items[j].center) < timeWindow / 2) {
5235                         if (!items[j].cluster) {
5236                             neighbors++;
5237                         }
5238                         j--;
5239                     }
5240 
5241                     // loop through items right from the current item
5242                     var k = i + 1;
5243                     while (k < items.length && (items[k].center - item.center) < timeWindow / 2) {
5244                         neighbors++;
5245                         k++;
5246                     }
5247 
5248                     // loop through the created clusters
5249                     var l = clusters.length - 1;
5250                     while (l >= 0 && (item.center - clusters[l].center) < timeWindow / 2) {
5251                         if (item.group == clusters[l].group) {
5252                             neighbors++;
5253                         }
5254                         l--;
5255                     }
5256 
5257                     // aggregate until the number of items is within maxItems
5258                     if (neighbors > maxItems) {
5259                         // too busy in this window.
5260                         var num = neighbors - maxItems + 1;
5261                         var clusterItems = [];
5262 
5263                         // append the items to the cluster,
5264                         // and calculate the average start for the cluster
5265                         var avg = undefined;  // number. average of all start dates
5266                         var min = undefined;  // number. minimum of all start dates
5267                         var max = undefined;  // number. maximum of all start and end dates
5268                         var containsRanges = false;
5269                         var count = 0;
5270                         var m = i;
5271                         while (clusterItems.length < num && m < items.length) {
5272                             var p = items[m];
5273                             var start = p.start.valueOf();
5274                             var end = p.end ? p.end.valueOf() : p.start.valueOf();
5275                             clusterItems.push(p);
5276                             if (count) {
5277                                 // calculate new average (use fractions to prevent overflow)
5278                                 avg = (count / (count + 1)) * avg + (1 / (count + 1)) * p.center;
5279                             }
5280                             else {
5281                                 avg = p.center;
5282                             }
5283                             min = (min != undefined) ? Math.min(min, start) : start;
5284                             max = (max != undefined) ? Math.max(max, end) : end;
5285                             containsRanges = containsRanges || (p instanceof links.Timeline.ItemRange);
5286                             count++;
5287                             m++;
5288                         }
5289 
5290                         var cluster;
5291                         var title = 'Cluster containing ' + count +
5292                             ' events. Zoom in to see the individual events.';
5293                         var content = '<div title="' + title + '">' + count + ' events</div>';
5294                         var group = item.group ? item.group.content : undefined;
5295                         if (containsRanges) {
5296                             // boxes and/or ranges
5297                             cluster = this.timeline.createItem({
5298                                 'start': new Date(min),
5299                                 'end': new Date(max),
5300                                 'content': content,
5301                                 'group': group
5302                             });
5303                         }
5304                         else {
5305                             // boxes only
5306                             cluster = this.timeline.createItem({
5307                                 'start': new Date(avg),
5308                                 'content': content,
5309                                 'group': group
5310                             });
5311                         }
5312                         cluster.isCluster = true;
5313                         cluster.items = clusterItems;
5314                         cluster.items.forEach(function (item) {
5315                             item.cluster = cluster;
5316                         });
5317 
5318                         clusters.push(cluster);
5319                         i += num;
5320                     }
5321                     else {
5322                         delete item.cluster;
5323                         i += 1;
5324                     }
5325                 }
5326             }
5327         }
5328 
5329         this.cache[level] = clusters;
5330     }
5331 
5332     return clusters;
5333 };

5338 
5339 /**
5340  * Event listener (singleton)
5341  */
5342 links.events = links.events || {
5343     'listeners': [],
5344 
5345     /**
5346      * Find a single listener by its object
5347      * @param {Object} object
5348      * @return {Number} index  -1 when not found
5349      */
5350     'indexOf': function (object) {
5351         var listeners = this.listeners;
5352         for (var i = 0, iMax = this.listeners.length; i < iMax; i++) {
5353             var listener = listeners[i];
5354             if (listener && listener.object == object) {
5355                 return i;
5356             }
5357         }
5358         return -1;
5359     },
5360 
5361     /**
5362      * Add an event listener
5363      * @param {Object} object
5364      * @param {String} event       The name of an event, for example 'select'
5365      * @param {function} callback  The callback method, called when the
5366      *                             event takes place
5367      */
5368     'addListener': function (object, event, callback) {
5369         var index = this.indexOf(object);
5370         var listener = this.listeners[index];
5371         if (!listener) {
5372             listener = {
5373                 'object': object,
5374                 'events': {}
5375             };
5376             this.listeners.push(listener);
5377         }
5378 
5379         var callbacks = listener.events[event];
5380         if (!callbacks) {
5381             callbacks = [];
5382             listener.events[event] = callbacks;
5383         }
5384 
5385         // add the callback if it does not yet exist
5386         if (callbacks.indexOf(callback) == -1) {
5387             callbacks.push(callback);
5388         }
5389     },
5390 
5391     /**
5392      * Remove an event listener
5393      * @param {Object} object
5394      * @param {String} event       The name of an event, for example 'select'
5395      * @param {function} callback  The registered callback method
5396      */
5397     'removeListener': function (object, event, callback) {
5398         var index = this.indexOf(object);
5399         var listener = this.listeners[index];
5400         if (listener) {
5401             var callbacks = listener.events[event];
5402             if (callbacks) {
5403                 var index = callbacks.indexOf(callback);
5404                 if (index != -1) {
5405                     callbacks.splice(index, 1);
5406                 }
5407 
5408                 // remove the array when empty
5409                 if (callbacks.length == 0) {
5410                     delete listener.events[event];
5411                 }
5412             }
5413 
5414             // count the number of registered events. remove listener when empty
5415             var count = 0;
5416             var events = listener.events;
5417             for (var e in events) {
5418                 if (events.hasOwnProperty(e)) {
5419                     count++;
5420                 }
5421             }
5422             if (count == 0) {
5423                 delete this.listeners[index];
5424             }
5425         }
5426     },
5427 
5428     /**
5429      * Remove all registered event listeners
5430      */
5431     'removeAllListeners': function () {
5432         this.listeners = [];
5433     },
5434 
5435     /**
5436      * Trigger an event. All registered event handlers will be called
5437      * @param {Object} object
5438      * @param {String} event
5439      * @param {Object} properties (optional)
5440      */
5441     'trigger': function (object, event, properties) {
5442         var index = this.indexOf(object);
5443         var listener = this.listeners[index];
5444         if (listener) {
5445             var callbacks = listener.events[event];
5446             if (callbacks) {
5447                 for (var i = 0, iMax = callbacks.length; i < iMax; i++) {
5448                     callbacks[i](properties);
5449                 }
5450             }
5451         }
5452     }
5453 };

5457 
5458 /**
5459  * @constructor  links.Timeline.StepDate
5460  * The class StepDate is an iterator for dates. You provide a start date and an
5461  * end date. The class itself determines the best scale (step size) based on the
5462  * provided start Date, end Date, and minimumStep.
5463  *
5464  * If minimumStep is provided, the step size is chosen as close as possible
5465  * to the minimumStep but larger than minimumStep. If minimumStep is not
5466  * provided, the scale is set to 1 DAY.
5467  * The minimumStep should correspond with the onscreen size of about 6 characters
5468  *
5469  * Alternatively, you can set a scale by hand.
5470  * After creation, you can initialize the class by executing start(). Then you
5471  * can iterate from the start date to the end date via next(). You can check if
5472  * the end date is reached with the function end(). After each step, you can
5473  * retrieve the current date via get().
5474  * The class step has scales ranging from milliseconds, seconds, minutes, hours,
5475  * days, to years.
5476  *
5477  * Version: 1.2
5478  *
5479  * @param {Date} start          The start date, for example new Date(2010, 9, 21)
5480  *                              or new Date(2010, 9, 21, 23, 45, 00)
5481  * @param {Date} end            The end date
5482  * @param {Number}  minimumStep Optional. Minimum step size in milliseconds
5483  */
5484 links.Timeline.StepDate = function(start, end, minimumStep) {
5485 
5486     // variables
5487     this.current = new Date();
5488     this._start = new Date();
5489     this._end = new Date();
5490 
5491     this.autoScale  = true;
5492     this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;
5493     this.step = 1;
5494 
5495     // initialize the range
5496     this.setRange(start, end, minimumStep);
5497 };
5498 
5499 /// enum scale
5500 links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE = {
5501     MILLISECOND: 1,
5502     SECOND: 2,
5503     MINUTE: 3,
5504     HOUR: 4,
5505     DAY: 5,
5506     WEEKDAY: 6,
5507     MONTH: 7,
5508     YEAR: 8
5509 };
5510 
5511 
5512 /**
5513  * Set a new range
5514  * If minimumStep is provided, the step size is chosen as close as possible
5515  * to the minimumStep but larger than minimumStep. If minimumStep is not
5516  * provided, the scale is set to 1 DAY.
5517  * The minimumStep should correspond with the onscreen size of about 6 characters
5518  * @param {Date} start        The start date and time.
5519  * @param {Date} end          The end date and time.
5520  * @param {int}  minimumStep  Optional. Minimum step size in milliseconds
5521  */
5522 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.setRange = function(start, end, minimumStep) {
5523     if (!(start instanceof Date) || !(end instanceof Date)) {
5524         //throw  "No legal start or end date in method setRange";
5525         return;
5526     }
5527 
5528     this._start = (start != undefined) ? new Date(start.valueOf()) : new Date();
5529     this._end = (end != undefined) ? new Date(end.valueOf()) : new Date();
5530 
5531     if (this.autoScale) {
5532         this.setMinimumStep(minimumStep);
5533     }
5534 };
5535 
5536 /**
5537  * Set the step iterator to the start date.
5538  */
5539 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.start = function() {
5540     this.current = new Date(this._start.valueOf());
5541     this.roundToMinor();
5542 };
5543 
5544 /**
5545  * Round the current date to the first minor date value
5546  * This must be executed once when the current date is set to start Date
5547  */
5548 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.roundToMinor = function() {
5549     // round to floor
5550     // IMPORTANT: we have no breaks in this switch! (this is no bug)
5551     //noinspection FallthroughInSwitchStatementJS
5552     switch (this.scale) {
5553         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:
5554             this.current.setFullYear(this.step * Math.floor(this.current.getFullYear() / this.step));
5555             this.current.setMonth(0);
5556         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setDate(1);
5557         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          // intentional fall through
5558         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY:      this.current.setHours(0);
5559         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         this.current.setMinutes(0);
5560         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current.setSeconds(0);
5561         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current.setMilliseconds(0);
5562         //case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND: // nothing to do for milliseconds
5563     }
5564 
5565     if (this.step != 1) {
5566         // round down to the first minor value that is a multiple of the current step size
5567         switch (this.scale) {
5568             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:  this.current.setMilliseconds(this.current.getMilliseconds() - this.current.getMilliseconds() % this.step);  break;
5569             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current.setSeconds(this.current.getSeconds() - this.current.getSeconds() % this.step); break;
5570             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current.setMinutes(this.current.getMinutes() - this.current.getMinutes() % this.step); break;
5571             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         this.current.setHours(this.current.getHours() - this.current.getHours() % this.step); break;
5572             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY:      // intentional fall through
5573             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          this.current.setDate((this.current.getDate()-1) - (this.current.getDate()-1) % this.step + 1); break;
5574             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setMonth(this.current.getMonth() - this.current.getMonth() % this.step);  break;
5575             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         this.current.setFullYear(this.current.getFullYear() - this.current.getFullYear() % this.step); break;
5576             default: break;
5577         }
5578     }
5579 };
5580 
5581 /**
5582  * Check if the end date is reached
5583  * @return {boolean}  true if the current date has passed the end date
5584  */
5585 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.end = function () {
5586     return (this.current.valueOf() > this._end.valueOf());
5587 };
5588 
5589 /**
5590  * Do the next step
5591  */
5592 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.next = function() {
5593     var prev = this.current.valueOf();
5594 
5595     // Two cases, needed to prevent issues with switching daylight savings 
5596     // (end of March and end of October)
5597     if (this.current.getMonth() < 6)   {
5598         switch (this.scale) {
5599             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:
5600 
5601                 this.current = new Date(this.current.valueOf() + this.step); break;
5602             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current = new Date(this.current.valueOf() + this.step * 1000); break;
5603             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current = new Date(this.current.valueOf() + this.step * 1000 * 60); break;
5604             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:
5605                 this.current = new Date(this.current.valueOf() + this.step * 1000 * 60 * 60);
5606                 // in case of skipping an hour for daylight savings, adjust the hour again (else you get: 0h 5h 9h ... instead of 0h 4h 8h ...)
5607                 var h = this.current.getHours();
5608                 this.current.setHours(h - (h % this.step));
5609                 break;
5610             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY:      // intentional fall through
5611             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          this.current.setDate(this.current.getDate() + this.step); break;
5612             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setMonth(this.current.getMonth() + this.step); break;
5613             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         this.current.setFullYear(this.current.getFullYear() + this.step); break;
5614             default:                      break;
5615         }
5616     }
5617     else {
5618         switch (this.scale) {
5619             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:  this.current = new Date(this.current.valueOf() + this.step); break;
5620             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current.setSeconds(this.current.getSeconds() + this.step); break;
5621             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current.setMinutes(this.current.getMinutes() + this.step); break;
5622             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         this.current.setHours(this.current.getHours() + this.step); break;
5623             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY:      // intentional fall through
5624             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          this.current.setDate(this.current.getDate() + this.step); break;
5625             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setMonth(this.current.getMonth() + this.step); break;
5626             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         this.current.setFullYear(this.current.getFullYear() + this.step); break;
5627             default:                      break;
5628         }
5629     }
5630 
5631     if (this.step != 1) {
5632         // round down to the correct major value
5633         switch (this.scale) {
5634             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:  if(this.current.getMilliseconds() < this.step) this.current.setMilliseconds(0);  break;
5635             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       if(this.current.getSeconds() < this.step) this.current.setSeconds(0);  break;
5636             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       if(this.current.getMinutes() < this.step) this.current.setMinutes(0);  break;
5637             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         if(this.current.getHours() < this.step) this.current.setHours(0);  break;
5638             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY:      // intentional fall through
5639             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          if(this.current.getDate() < this.step+1) this.current.setDate(1); break;
5640             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        if(this.current.getMonth() < this.step) this.current.setMonth(0);  break;
5641             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         break; // nothing to do for year
5642             default:                break;
5643         }
5644     }
5645 
5646     // safety mechanism: if current time is still unchanged, move to the end
5647     if (this.current.valueOf() == prev) {
5648         this.current = new Date(this._end.valueOf());
5649     }
5650 };
5651 
5652 
5653 /**
5654  * Get the current datetime
5655  * @return {Date}  current The current date
5656  */
5657 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.getCurrent = function() {
5658     return this.current;
5659 };
5660 
5661 /**
5662  * Set a custom scale. Autoscaling will be disabled.
5663  * For example setScale(SCALE.MINUTES, 5) will result
5664  * in minor steps of 5 minutes, and major steps of an hour.
5665  *
5666  * @param {links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE} newScale
5667  *                               A scale. Choose from SCALE.MILLISECOND,
5668  *                               SCALE.SECOND, SCALE.MINUTE, SCALE.HOUR,
5669  *                               SCALE.WEEKDAY, SCALE.DAY, SCALE.MONTH,
5670  *                               SCALE.YEAR.
5671  * @param {Number}     newStep   A step size, by default 1. Choose for
5672  *                               example 1, 2, 5, or 10.
5673  */
5674 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.setScale = function(newScale, newStep) {
5675     this.scale = newScale;
5676 
5677     if (newStep > 0) {
5678         this.step = newStep;
5679     }
5680 
5681     this.autoScale = false;
5682 };
5683 
5684 /**
5685  * Enable or disable autoscaling
5686  * @param {boolean} enable  If true, autoascaling is set true
5687  */
5688 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.setAutoScale = function (enable) {
5689     this.autoScale = enable;
5690 };
5691 
5692 
5693 /**
5694  * Automatically determine the scale that bests fits the provided minimum step
5695  * @param {Number} minimumStep  The minimum step size in milliseconds
5696  */
5697 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.setMinimumStep = function(minimumStep) {
5698     if (minimumStep == undefined) {
5699         return;
5700     }
5701 
5702     var stepYear       = (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30 * 12);
5703     var stepMonth      = (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30);
5704     var stepDay        = (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24);
5705     var stepHour       = (1000 * 60 * 60);
5706     var stepMinute     = (1000 * 60);
5707     var stepSecond     = (1000);
5708     var stepMillisecond= (1);
5709 
5710     // find the smallest step that is larger than the provided minimumStep
5711     if (stepYear*1000 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 1000;}
5712     if (stepYear*500 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 500;}
5713     if (stepYear*100 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 100;}
5714     if (stepYear*50 > minimumStep)          {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 50;}
5715     if (stepYear*10 > minimumStep)          {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 10;}
5716     if (stepYear*5 > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 5;}
5717     if (stepYear > minimumStep)             {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 1;}
5718     if (stepMonth*3 > minimumStep)          {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH;       this.step = 3;}
5719     if (stepMonth > minimumStep)            {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH;       this.step = 1;}
5720     if (stepDay*5 > minimumStep)            {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;         this.step = 5;}
5721     if (stepDay*2 > minimumStep)            {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;         this.step = 2;}
5722     if (stepDay > minimumStep)              {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;         this.step = 1;}
5723     if (stepDay/2 > minimumStep)            {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY;     this.step = 1;}
5724     if (stepHour*4 > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR;        this.step = 4;}
5725     if (stepHour > minimumStep)             {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR;        this.step = 1;}
5726     if (stepMinute*15 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 15;}
5727     if (stepMinute*10 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 10;}
5728     if (stepMinute*5 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 5;}
5729     if (stepMinute > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 1;}
5730     if (stepSecond*15 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 15;}
5731     if (stepSecond*10 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 10;}
5732     if (stepSecond*5 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 5;}
5733     if (stepSecond > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 1;}
5734     if (stepMillisecond*200 > minimumStep)  {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 200;}
5735     if (stepMillisecond*100 > minimumStep)  {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 100;}
5736     if (stepMillisecond*50 > minimumStep)   {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 50;}
5737     if (stepMillisecond*10 > minimumStep)   {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 10;}
5738     if (stepMillisecond*5 > minimumStep)    {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 5;}
5739     if (stepMillisecond > minimumStep)      {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 1;}
5740 };
5741 
5742 /**
5743  * Snap a date to a rounded value. The snap intervals are dependent on the
5744  * current scale and step.
5745  * @param {Date} date   the date to be snapped
5746  */
5747 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.snap = function(date) {
5748     if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR) {
5749         var year = date.getFullYear() + Math.round(date.getMonth() / 12);
5750         date.setFullYear(Math.round(year / this.step) * this.step);
5751         date.setMonth(0);
5752         date.setDate(0);
5753         date.setHours(0);
5754         date.setMinutes(0);
5755         date.setSeconds(0);
5756         date.setMilliseconds(0);
5757     }
5758     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH) {
5759         if (date.getDate() > 15) {
5760             date.setDate(1);
5761             date.setMonth(date.getMonth() + 1);
5762             // important: first set Date to 1, after that change the month.      
5763         }
5764         else {
5765             date.setDate(1);
5766         }
5767 
5768         date.setHours(0);
5769         date.setMinutes(0);
5770         date.setSeconds(0);
5771         date.setMilliseconds(0);
5772     }
5773     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY ||
5774         this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY) {
5775         switch (this.step) {
5776             case 5:
5777             case 2:
5778                 date.setHours(Math.round(date.getHours() / 24) * 24); break;
5779             default:
5780                 date.setHours(Math.round(date.getHours() / 12) * 12); break;
5781         }
5782         date.setMinutes(0);
5783         date.setSeconds(0);
5784         date.setMilliseconds(0);
5785     }
5786     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR) {
5787         switch (this.step) {
5788             case 4:
5789                 date.setMinutes(Math.round(date.getMinutes() / 60) * 60); break;
5790             default:
5791                 date.setMinutes(Math.round(date.getMinutes() / 30) * 30); break;
5792         }
5793         date.setSeconds(0);
5794         date.setMilliseconds(0);
5795     } else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE) {
5796         switch (this.step) {
5797             case 15:
5798             case 10:
5799                 date.setMinutes(Math.round(date.getMinutes() / 5) * 5);
5800                 date.setSeconds(0);
5801                 break;
5802             case 5:
5803                 date.setSeconds(Math.round(date.getSeconds() / 60) * 60); break;
5804             default:
5805                 date.setSeconds(Math.round(date.getSeconds() / 30) * 30); break;
5806         }
5807         date.setMilliseconds(0);
5808     }
5809     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND) {
5810         switch (this.step) {
5811             case 15:
5812             case 10:
5813                 date.setSeconds(Math.round(date.getSeconds() / 5) * 5);
5814                 date.setMilliseconds(0);
5815                 break;
5816             case 5:
5817                 date.setMilliseconds(Math.round(date.getMilliseconds() / 1000) * 1000); break;
5818             default:
5819                 date.setMilliseconds(Math.round(date.getMilliseconds() / 500) * 500); break;
5820         }
5821     }
5822     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND) {
5823         var step = this.step > 5 ? this.step / 2 : 1;
5824         date.setMilliseconds(Math.round(date.getMilliseconds() / step) * step);
5825     }
5826 };
5827 
5828 /**
5829  * Check if the current step is a major step (for example when the step
5830  * is DAY, a major step is each first day of the MONTH)
5831  * @return {boolean} true if current date is major, else false.
5832  */
5833 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.isMajor = function() {
5834     switch (this.scale) {
5835         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:
5836             return (this.current.getMilliseconds() == 0);
5837         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:
5838             return (this.current.getSeconds() == 0);
5839         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:
5840             return (this.current.getHours() == 0) && (this.current.getMinutes() == 0);
5841         // Note: this is no bug. Major label is equal for both minute and hour scale
5842         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:
5843             return (this.current.getHours() == 0);
5844         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY: // intentional fall through
5845         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:
5846             return (this.current.getDate() == 1);
5847         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:
5848             return (this.current.getMonth() == 0);
5849         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:
5850             return false;
5851         default:
5852             return false;
5853     }
5854 };
5855 
5856 
5857 /**
5858  * Returns formatted text for the minor axislabel, depending on the current
5859  * date and the scale. For example when scale is MINUTE, the current time is
5860  * formatted as "hh:mm".
5861  * @param {Object} options
5862  * @param {Date} [date] custom date. if not provided, current date is taken
5863  */
5864 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.getLabelMinor = function(options, date) {
5865     if (date == undefined) {
5866         date = this.current;
5867     }
5868 
5869     switch (this.scale) {
5870         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:  return String(date.getMilliseconds());
5871         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       return String(date.getSeconds());
5872         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:
5873             return this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" + this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2);
5874         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:
5875             return this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" + this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2);
5876         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY:      return options.DAYS_SHORT[date.getDay()] + ' ' + date.getDate();
5877         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          return String(date.getDate());
5878         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        return options.MONTHS_SHORT[date.getMonth()];   // month is zero based
5879         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         return String(date.getFullYear());
5880         default:                                         return "";
5881     }
5882 };
5883 
5884 
5885 /**
5886  * Returns formatted text for the major axislabel, depending on the current
5887  * date and the scale. For example when scale is MINUTE, the major scale is
5888  * hours, and the hour will be formatted as "hh".
5889  * @param {Object} options
5890  * @param {Date} [date] custom date. if not provided, current date is taken
5891  */
5892 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.getLabelMajor = function(options, date) {
5893     if (date == undefined) {
5894         date = this.current;
5895     }
5896 
5897     switch (this.scale) {
5898         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:
5899             return  this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" +
5900                 this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2) + ":" +
5901                 this.addZeros(date.getSeconds(), 2);
5902         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:
5903             return  date.getDate() + " " +
5904                 options.MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
5905                 this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" +
5906                 this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2);
5907         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:
5908             return  options.DAYS[date.getDay()] + " " +
5909                 date.getDate() + " " +
5910                 options.MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
5911                 date.getFullYear();
5912         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:
5913             return  options.DAYS[date.getDay()] + " " +
5914                 date.getDate() + " " +
5915                 options.MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
5916                 date.getFullYear();
5917         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.WEEKDAY:
5918         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:
5919             return  options.MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
5920                 date.getFullYear();
5921         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:
5922             return String(date.getFullYear());
5923         default:
5924             return "";
5925     }
5926 };
5927 
5928 /**
5929  * Add leading zeros to the given value to match the desired length.
5930  * For example addZeros(123, 5) returns "00123"
5931  * @param {int} value   A value
5932  * @param {int} len     Desired final length
5933  * @return {string}     value with leading zeros
5934  */
5935 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.addZeros = function(value, len) {
5936     var str = "" + value;
5937     while (str.length < len) {
5938         str = "0" + str;
5939     }
5940     return str;
5941 };

5946 
5947 /**
5948  * Image Loader service.
5949  * can be used to get a callback when a certain image is loaded
5950  *
5951  */
5952 links.imageloader = (function () {
5953     var urls = {};  // the loaded urls
5954     var callbacks = {}; // the urls currently being loaded. Each key contains 
5955     // an array with callbacks
5956 
5957     /**
5958      * Check if an image url is loaded
5959      * @param {String} url
5960      * @return {boolean} loaded   True when loaded, false when not loaded
5961      *                            or when being loaded
5962      */
5963     function isLoaded (url) {
5964         if (urls[url] == true) {
5965             return true;
5966         }
5967 
5968         var image = new Image();
5969         image.src = url;
5970         if (image.complete) {
5971             return true;
5972         }
5973 
5974         return false;
5975     }
5976 
5977     /**
5978      * Check if an image url is being loaded
5979      * @param {String} url
5980      * @return {boolean} loading   True when being loaded, false when not loading
5981      *                             or when already loaded
5982      */
5983     function isLoading (url) {
5984         return (callbacks[url] != undefined);
5985     }
5986 
5987     /**
5988      * Load given image url
5989      * @param {String} url
5990      * @param {function} callback
5991      * @param {boolean} sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded  optional
5992      */
5993     function load (url, callback, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
5994         if (sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded == undefined) {
5995             sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded = true;
5996         }
5997 
5998         if (isLoaded(url)) {
5999             if (sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
6000                 callback(url);
6001             }
6002             return;
6003         }
6004 
6005         if (isLoading(url) && !sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
6006             return;
6007         }
6008 
6009         var c = callbacks[url];
6010         if (!c) {
6011             var image = new Image();
6012             image.src = url;
6013 
6014             c = [];
6015             callbacks[url] = c;
6016 
6017             image.onload = function (event) {
6018                 urls[url] = true;
6019                 delete callbacks[url];
6020 
6021                 for (var i = 0; i < c.length; i++) {
6022                     c[i](url);
6023                 }
6024             }
6025         }
6026 
6027         if (c.indexOf(callback) == -1) {
6028             c.push(callback);
6029         }
6030     }
6031 
6032     /**
6033      * Load a set of images, and send a callback as soon as all images are
6034      * loaded
6035      * @param {String[]} urls
6036      * @param {function } callback
6037      * @param {boolean} sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded
6038      */
6039     function loadAll (urls, callback, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
6040         // list all urls which are not yet loaded
6041         var urlsLeft = [];
6042         urls.forEach(function (url) {
6043             if (!isLoaded(url)) {
6044                 urlsLeft.push(url);
6045             }
6046         });
6047 
6048         if (urlsLeft.length) {
6049             // there are unloaded images
6050             var countLeft = urlsLeft.length;
6051             urlsLeft.forEach(function (url) {
6052                 load(url, function () {
6053                     countLeft--;
6054                     if (countLeft == 0) {
6055                         // done!
6056                         callback();
6057                     }
6058                 }, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded);
6059             });
6060         }
6061         else {
6062             // we are already done!
6063             if (sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
6064                 callback();
6065             }
6066         }
6067     }
6068 
6069     /**
6070      * Recursively retrieve all image urls from the images located inside a given
6071      * HTML element
6072      * @param {Node} elem
6073      * @param {String[]} urls   Urls will be added here (no duplicates)
6074      */
6075     function filterImageUrls (elem, urls) {
6076         var child = elem.firstChild;
6077         while (child) {
6078             if (child.tagName == 'IMG') {
6079                 var url = child.src;
6080                 if (urls.indexOf(url) == -1) {
6081                     urls.push(url);
6082                 }
6083             }
6084 
6085             filterImageUrls(child, urls);
6086 
6087             child = child.nextSibling;
6088         }
6089     }
6090 
6091     return {
6092         'isLoaded': isLoaded,
6093         'isLoading': isLoading,
6094         'load': load,
6095         'loadAll': loadAll,
6096         'filterImageUrls': filterImageUrls
6097     };
6098 })();
6099

6104 /**
6105  * Add and event listener. Works for all browsers
6106  * @param {Element} element    An html element
6107  * @param {string}      action     The action, for example "click",
6108  *                                 without the prefix "on"
6109  * @param {function}    listener   The callback function to be executed
6110  * @param {boolean}     useCapture
6111  */
6112 links.Timeline.addEventListener = function (element, action, listener, useCapture) {
6113     if (element.addEventListener) {
6114         if (useCapture === undefined)
6115             useCapture = false;
6116 
6117         if (action === "mousewheel" && navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") >= 0) {
6118             action = "DOMMouseScroll";  // For Firefox
6119         }
6120 
6121         element.addEventListener(action, listener, useCapture);
6122     } else {
6123         element.attachEvent("on" + action, listener);  // IE browsers
6124     }
6125 };
6126 
6127 /**
6128  * Remove an event listener from an element
6129  * @param {Element}  element   An html dom element
6130  * @param {string}       action    The name of the event, for example "mousedown"
6131  * @param {function}     listener  The listener function
6132  * @param {boolean}      useCapture
6133  */
6134 links.Timeline.removeEventListener = function(element, action, listener, useCapture) {
6135     if (element.removeEventListener) {
6136         // non-IE browsers
6137         if (useCapture === undefined)
6138             useCapture = false;
6139 
6140         if (action === "mousewheel" && navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") >= 0) {
6141             action = "DOMMouseScroll";  // For Firefox
6142         }
6143 
6144         element.removeEventListener(action, listener, useCapture);
6145     } else {
6146         // IE browsers
6147         element.detachEvent("on" + action, listener);
6148     }
6149 };
6150 
6151 
6152 /**
6153  * Get HTML element which is the target of the event
6154  * @param {Event} event
6155  * @return {Element} target element
6156  */
6157 links.Timeline.getTarget = function (event) {
6158     // code from http://www.quirksmode.org/js/events_properties.html
6159     if (!event) {
6160         event = window.event;
6161     }
6162 
6163     var target;
6164 
6165     if (event.target) {
6166         target = event.target;
6167     }
6168     else if (event.srcElement) {
6169         target = event.srcElement;
6170     }
6171 
6172     if (target.nodeType != undefined && target.nodeType == 3) {
6173         // defeat Safari bug
6174         target = target.parentNode;
6175     }
6176 
6177     return target;
6178 };
6179 
6180 /**
6181  * Stop event propagation
6182  */
6183 links.Timeline.stopPropagation = function (event) {
6184     if (!event)
6185         event = window.event;
6186 
6187     if (event.stopPropagation) {
6188         event.stopPropagation();  // non-IE browsers
6189     }
6190     else {
6191         event.cancelBubble = true;  // IE browsers
6192     }
6193 };
6194 
6195 
6196 /**
6197  * Cancels the event if it is cancelable, without stopping further propagation of the event.
6198  */
6199 links.Timeline.preventDefault = function (event) {
6200     if (!event)
6201         event = window.event;
6202 
6203     if (event.preventDefault) {
6204         event.preventDefault();  // non-IE browsers
6205     }
6206     else {
6207         event.returnValue = false;  // IE browsers
6208     }
6209 };

6212 /**
6213  * Retrieve the absolute left value of a DOM element
6214  * @param {Element} elem        A dom element, for example a div
6215  * @return {number} left        The absolute left position of this element
6216  *                              in the browser page.
6217  */
6218 links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft = function(elem) {
6219     var doc = document.documentElement;
6220     var body = document.body;
6221 
6222     var left = elem.offsetLeft;
6223     var e = elem.offsetParent;
6224     while (e != null && e != body && e != doc) {
6225         left += e.offsetLeft;
6226         left -= e.scrollLeft;
6227         e = e.offsetParent;
6228     }
6229     return left;
6230 };
6231 
6232 /**
6233  * Retrieve the absolute top value of a DOM element
6234  * @param {Element} elem        A dom element, for example a div
6235  * @return {number} top        The absolute top position of this element
6236  *                              in the browser page.
6237  */
6238 links.Timeline.getAbsoluteTop = function(elem) {
6239     var doc = document.documentElement;
6240     var body = document.body;
6241 
6242     var top = elem.offsetTop;
6243     var e = elem.offsetParent;
6244     while (e != null && e != body && e != doc) {
6245         top += e.offsetTop;
6246         top -= e.scrollTop;
6247         e = e.offsetParent;
6248     }
6249     return top;
6250 };
6251 
6252 /**
6253  * Get the absolute, vertical mouse position from an event.
6254  * @param {Event} event
6255  * @return {Number} pageY
6256  */
6257 links.Timeline.getPageY = function (event) {
6258     if ('pageY' in event) {
6259         return event.pageY;
6260     }
6261     else {
6262         var clientY;
6263         if (('targetTouches' in event) && event.targetTouches.length) {
6264             clientY = event.targetTouches[0].clientY;
6265         }
6266         else {
6267             clientY = event.clientY;
6268         }
6269 
6270         var doc = document.documentElement;
6271         var body = document.body;
6272         return clientY +
6273             ( doc && doc.scrollTop || body && body.scrollTop || 0 ) -
6274             ( doc && doc.clientTop || body && body.clientTop || 0 );
6275     }
6276 };
6277 
6278 /**
6279  * Get the absolute, horizontal mouse position from an event.
6280  * @param {Event} event
6281  * @return {Number} pageX
6282  */
6283 links.Timeline.getPageX = function (event) {
6284     if ('pageY' in event) {
6285         return event.pageX;
6286     }
6287     else {
6288         var clientX;
6289         if (('targetTouches' in event) && event.targetTouches.length) {
6290             clientX = event.targetTouches[0].clientX;
6291         }
6292         else {
6293             clientX = event.clientX;
6294         }
6295 
6296         var doc = document.documentElement;
6297         var body = document.body;
6298         return clientX +
6299             ( doc && doc.scrollLeft || body && body.scrollLeft || 0 ) -
6300             ( doc && doc.clientLeft || body && body.clientLeft || 0 );
6301     }
6302 };

6304 /**
6305  * add a className to the given elements style
6306  * @param {Element} elem
6307  * @param {String} className
6308  */
6309 links.Timeline.addClassName = function(elem, className) {
6310     var classes = elem.className.split(' ');
6311     if (classes.indexOf(className) == -1) {
6312         classes.push(className); // add the class to the array
6313         elem.className = classes.join(' ');
6314     }
6315 };
6316 
6317 /**
6318  * add a className to the given elements style
6319  * @param {Element} elem
6320  * @param {String} className
6321  */
6322 links.Timeline.removeClassName = function(elem, className) {
6323     var classes = elem.className.split(' ');
6324     var index = classes.indexOf(className);
6325     if (index != -1) {
6326         classes.splice(index, 1); // remove the class from the array
6327         elem.className = classes.join(' ');
6328     }
6329 };

6331 /**
6332  * Check if given object is a Javascript Array
6333  * @param {*} obj
6334  * @return {Boolean} isArray    true if the given object is an array
6335  */
6336 // See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2943805/javascript-instanceof-typeof-in-gwt-jsni
6337 links.Timeline.isArray = function (obj) {
6338     if (obj instanceof Array) {
6339         return true;
6340     }
6341     return (Object.prototype.toString.call(obj) === '[object Array]');
6342 };
6343 
6344 /**
6345  * parse a JSON date
6346  * @param {Date | String | Number} date    Date object to be parsed. Can be:
6347  *                                         - a Date object like new Date(),
6348  *                                         - a long like 1356970529389,
6349  *                                         an ISO String like "2012-12-31T16:16:07.213Z",
6350  *                                         or a .Net Date string like
6351  *                                         "\/Date(1356970529389)\/"
6352  * @return {Date} parsedDate
6353  */
6354 links.Timeline.parseJSONDate = function (date) {
6355     if (date == undefined) {
6356         return undefined;
6357     }
6358 
6359     //test for date
6360     if (date instanceof Date) {
6361         return date;
6362     }
6363 
6364     // test for MS format.
6365     // FIXME: will fail on a Number
6366     var m = date.match(/\/Date\((-?\d+)([-\+]?\d{2})?(\d{2})?\)\//i);
6367     if (m) {
6368         var offset = m[2]
6369             ? (3600000 * m[2]) // hrs offset
6370             + (60000 * m[3] * (m[2] / Math.abs(m[2]))) // mins offset
6371             : 0;
6372 
6373         return new Date(
6374             (1 * m[1]) // ticks
6375                 + offset
6376         );
6377     }
6378 
6379     // failing that, try to parse whatever we've got.
6380     return Date.parse(date);
6381 };
